0 452 self.misses = 0 453 454 def _get_cache_path(self, key: str) -> str: 455 hash_key = hashlib.md5(key.encode("utf-8")).hexdigest() 456 return os.path.join(Config.CACHE_DIR, f"{hash_key}.pkl.gz") 457 458 @backoff.on_exception(backoff.expo, Exception, max_tries=3) 459 def get(self, key: str): 460 cache_file = self._get_cache_path(key) 461 if os.path.exists(cache_file): 462 try: 463 with open(cache_file, "rb") as f: 464 compressed_data = f.read() 465 data = pickle.loads(zlib.decompress(compressed_data)) 466 self.hits += 1 467 return data 468 except Exception as e: 469 key: str, data, ttl: Optional[int] = None): 477 cache_file = self._get_cache_path(key) 478 try: 479 compressed_data = zlib.compress(pickle.dumps(data)) 480 temp_file = cache_file + ".tmp" 481 with os.path.exists(temp_file): 487 os.remove(temp_file) 489 def stats(self) -> dict: 490 return { 491 "hits": self.hits, 492 "misses": self.misses, 493 "hit_rate": ( 494 self.hits / (self.hits + self.misses) 495 if (self.hits + self.misses) > 0 496 else 0 497 ), 498 } 499 500 501class RedisCache(CacheBackend): 502 def __init__(self, url: str): 503 try: 504 import redis # type: ignore 505 self.misses = 0 511 512 def get(self, key: str): 513 val = self.client.get(key) 514 if val is not None: 515 try: 516 data = pickle.loads(zlib.decompress(val)) 517 except Exception: 518 SQLiteCache(CacheBackend): 546 def __init__(self, path: str): 547 os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(path), exist_ok=True) 548 self.conn = sqlite3.connect(path, check_same_thread=False) 549 self.conn.execute( 550 "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cache (key TEXT PRIMARY KEY, value BLOB, expires_at INTEGER)" 551 ) 552 self.hits = 0 553 self.misses = 0 554 555 def get(self, key: str): 556 cur = self.conn.execute( 557 "SELECT value, expires_at FROM cache WHERE key=?", (key,) 558 ) 559 row = cur.fetchone() 560 if row: 561 value, exp = row 562 if exp is not None and exp < int(time.time()): 563 570 self.conn.execute("DELETE FROM cache WHERE key=?", (key,)) 571 self.conn.commit() 572 self.misses += 1 573 return None 574 self.hits += 1 575 return data 576 self.misses += 1 577 return None 578 cache (key, value, expires_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?)", 584 (key, val, exp), 585 ) 586 self.conn.commit() 588 def stats(self) -> dict: 589 return { 590 "hits": self.hits, 591 "misses": self.misses, 592 903def extract_tables(html: str) -> List[List[List[str]]]: 904 """Return all HTML tables as lists of rows and cells.""" 905 try: 906 soup = BeautifulSoup(html, "html.parser") 907 tables: 922def extract_images(html: str) -> List[Dict[str, str]]: 923 """Return image URLs and captions from thumbnail/figure elements.""" 924 try: 925 soup = BeautifulSoup(html, "html.parser") 926 results: params: dict | None = None, 960 headers: dict | None = None, 961 retries: int = Config.RETRIES, 962 proxy: str | None = None, 963) -> tuple[int, str]: 964 """Fetch a URL using ``aiohttp`` with automatic retries and logging.""" 965 966 if proxy is None and Config.PROXIES: 967 proxy = get_next_proxy() 968 969 for attempt in range(1, retries + 1): 970 try: 971 timeout = aiohttp.ClientTimeout(total=Config.TIMEOUT) 972 acquired_dummy = False 973 if ( 974 hasattr(fetch_semaphore, "active") 975 and hasattr(fetch_semaphore, "limit") 976 and not hasattr(fetch_semaphore, "acquire") 977 ): 978 while fetch_semaphore.active >= fetch_semaphore.limit: 979 await asyncio.sleep(0) 980 await fetch_semaphore.__aenter__() 981 acquired_dummy = True 982 else: 983 await fetch_semaphore.acquire() 984 try: 985 async with aiohttp.ClientSession(timeout=timeout) as session: 986 async with session.get( 987 url, params=params, headers=headers, proxy=proxy 988 ) as resp: 989 message=resp.reason, 997 headers=resp.headers, 998 ) 999 resp.raise_for_status() 1000 rate_limiter.record_success() 1001 return resp.status, await resp.text() 1002 finally: 1003 if acquired_dummy: 1004 await fetch_semaphore.__aexit__(None, None, None) 1005 else: 1006 fetch_semaphore.release() 1007 except aiohttp.ClientResponseError as e: 1008 if getattr(e, "status", None) == 429: 1009 logger.warning(f"HTTP 429 for {url}, backing off") 1010 rate_limiter.record_error() 1011 else: 1012 logger.warning(f"Attempt {attempt} failed for {url}: {e}") 1013 exc = e 1014 except asyncio.TimeoutError as e: 1015 logger.warning(f"Timeout while fetching {url}") 1016 rate_limiter.record_error() 1017 exc = e 1018 except Exception as e: 1019 logger.warning(f"Attempt {attempt} failed for {url}: {e}") 1020 exc = e 1021 if attempt < retries: 1022 metrics.request_retries_total.inc() 1023 await asyncio.sleep(2) 1024 else: 1025 log_failed_url(url) 1026 metrics.requests_failed_total.inc() 1027 raise exc 1028 1029 1030def fetch_html_content(title: str, lang: str) -> str: 1031 """Retrieve the raw HTML for a Wikipedia page using the REST API.""" 1032     217def get_next_proxy() -> str | None:
218    """Return the next proxy from ``Config.PROXIES`` cycling sequentially."""
219    global _proxy_index
220    if not Config.PROXIES:
221        return None
222    proxy = Config.PROXIES[_proxy_index % len(Config.PROXIES)]
223    _proxy_index += 1
224    return proxy
            
    233def get_base_url(lang: str) -> str:
234    """Return base Wikipedia URL for a given language."""
235    return BASE_URLS.get(lang, f"https://{lang}.wikipedia.org")
            
    238class RateLimiter:
239    """Simple exponential backoff rate limiter with jitter."""
241    def __init__(self, min_delay: float, max_delay: float | None = None):
242        if max_delay is None:
243            max_delay = min_delay
244        self.base_min = min_delay
245        self.base_max = max_delay
246        self.min_delay = min_delay
247        self.max_delay = max_delay
248        self.consecutive_failures = 0
249
250    def _sample_delay(self) -> float:
251        return random.uniform(self.min_delay, self.max_delay)
252
253    def wait(self):
254        time.sleep(self._sample_delay())
255
256    async def async_wait(self):
257        await asyncio.sleep(self._sample_delay())
258
259    def record_error(self):
260        self.consecutive_failures += 1
261        self.min_delay *= 2
262        self.max_delay *= 2
263
264    def record_success(self):
265        self.reset()
266
267    def reset(self):
268        self.consecutive_failures = 0
269        self.min_delay = self.base_min
270        self.max_delay = self.base_max
            
    241    def __init__(self, min_delay: float, max_delay: float | None = None):
242        if max_delay is None:
243            max_delay = min_delay
244        self.base_min = min_delay
245        self.base_max = max_delay
246        self.min_delay = min_delay
247        self.max_delay = max_delay
248        self.consecutive_failures = 0
            
    253    def wait(self):
254        time.sleep(self._sample_delay())
            
    256    async def async_wait(self):
257        await asyncio.sleep(self._sample_delay())
            
    259    def record_error(self):
260        self.consecutive_failures += 1
261        self.min_delay *= 2
262        self.max_delay *= 2
            
    264    def record_success(self):
265        self.reset()
            
    267    def reset(self):
268        self.consecutive_failures = 0
269        self.min_delay = self.base_min
270        self.max_delay = self.base_max
            
    284def normalize_category(name: str) -> Optional[str]:
285    """Retorna o nome canônico de uma categoria.
286
287    A comparação ignora acentos e diferenças de maiúsculas/minúsculas.
288    Se a categoria ou um de seus aliases for encontrado, devolve o nome
289    oficial; caso contrário, ``None``.
290    """
291
292    normalized = unidecode(name).lower()
293
294    for canonical in Config.CATEGORIES:
295        if unidecode(canonical).lower() == normalized:
296            return canonical
297
298    return CATEGORY_ALIASES.get(normalized)
            
    304class CustomFormatter(logging.Formatter):
305    grey = "\x1b[38;20m"
306    yellow = "\x1b[33;20m"
307    red = "\x1b[31;20m"
308    bold_red = "\x1b[31;1m"
309    reset = "\x1b[0m"
310    format_str = (
311        "%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s (%(filename)s:%(lineno)d)"
312    )
313
314    FORMATS = {
315        logging.DEBUG: grey + format_str + reset,
316        logging.INFO: grey + format_str + reset,
317        logging.WARNING: yellow + format_str + reset,
318        logging.ERROR: red + format_str + reset,
319        logging.CRITICAL: bold_red + format_str + reset,
320    }
321
322    def format(self, record):
323        log_fmt = self.FORMATS.get(record.levelno)
324        formatter = logging.Formatter(log_fmt)
325        return formatter.format(record)
            
    322    def format(self, record):
323        log_fmt = self.FORMATS.get(record.levelno)
324        formatter = logging.Formatter(log_fmt)
325        return formatter.format(record)
            
    328class JsonFormatter(logging.Formatter):
329    """Simple JSON formatter with standard fields."""
330
331    def format(self, record: logging.LogRecord) -> str:
332        rec = {
333            "timestamp": self.formatTime(record, self.datefmt),
334            "level": record.levelname,
335            "name": record.name,
336            "message": record.getMessage(),
337            "file": record.filename,
338            "line": record.lineno,
339        }
340        return json.dumps(rec, ensure_ascii=False)
            
    331    def format(self, record: logging.LogRecord) -> str:
332        rec = {
333            "timestamp": self.formatTime(record, self.datefmt),
334            "level": record.levelname,
335            "name": record.name,
336            "message": record.getMessage(),
337            "file": record.filename,
338            "line": record.lineno,
339        }
340        return json.dumps(rec, ensure_ascii=False)
            
    343class LokiHandler(logging.Handler):
344    """Simple handler that sends logs to a Loki HTTP endpoint."""
345
346    def __init__(self, url: str):
347        super().__init__()
348        self.url = url.rstrip("/")
349
350    def emit(self, record: logging.LogRecord) -> None:
351        try:
352            line = self.format(record)
353            payload = {
354                "streams": [
355                    {
356                        "labels": '{job="scraper"}',
357                        "entries": [
358                            {
359                                "ts": datetime.utcnow().isoformat() + "Z",
360                                "line": line,
361                            }
362                        ],
363                    }
364                ]
365            }
366            requests.post(self.url, json=payload, timeout=1)
367        except Exception:
368            pass
            
    346    def __init__(self, url: str):
347        super().__init__()
348        self.url = url.rstrip("/")
            
    350    def emit(self, record: logging.LogRecord) -> None:
351        try:
352            line = self.format(record)
353            payload = {
354                "streams": [
355                    {
356                        "labels": '{job="scraper"}',
357                        "entries": [
358                            {
359                                "ts": datetime.utcnow().isoformat() + "Z",
360                                "line": line,
361                            }
362                        ],
363                    }
364                ]
365            }
366            requests.post(self.url, json=payload, timeout=1)
367        except Exception:
368            pass
            
    371class ElasticsearchHandler(logging.Handler):
372    """Send logs to an Elasticsearch index."""
373
374    def __init__(self, url: str, index: str = "scraper"):
375        super().__init__()
376        self.url = url.rstrip("/")
377        self.index = index
378
379    def emit(self, record: logging.LogRecord) -> None:
380        try:
381            doc = {
382                "timestamp": datetime.utcnow().isoformat(),
383                "level": record.levelname,
384                "name": record.name,
385                "message": record.getMessage(),
386                "file": record.filename,
387                "line": record.lineno,
388            }
389            requests.post(f"{self.url}/{self.index}/_doc", json=doc, timeout=1)
390        except Exception:
391            pass

    394def setup_logger(name, log_file, level: int = logging.INFO, fmt: str = "text"):
395    """Configure and return a logger with console and file handlers."""
396    os.makedirs(Config.LOG_DIR, exist_ok=True)
397
398    logger = logging.getLogger(name)
399    logger.setLevel(level)
400    logger.handlers.clear()
401
402    formatter = JsonFormatter() if fmt == "json" else CustomFormatter()
403
404    handler = logging.FileHandler(os.path.join(Config.LOG_DIR, log_file))
405    handler.setFormatter(formatter)
406    logger.addHandler(handler)
407
408    console_handler = logging.StreamHandler()
409    console_handler.setFormatter(formatter)
410    logger.addHandler(console_handler)
411
412    if Config.LOG_SERVICE_URL:
413        if Config.LOG_SERVICE_TYPE == "elastic":
414            remote = ElasticsearchHandler(Config.LOG_SERVICE_URL)
415        else:
416            remote = LokiHandler(Config.LOG_SERVICE_URL)
417        remote.setFormatter(formatter)
418        logger.addHandler(remote)
419
420    return logger
            
    426def log_failed_url(url: str) -> None:
427    """Append a failing URL to ``failed_urls.log`` within :data:`Config.LOG_DIR`."""

431            fh.write(f"{url}\n")
432    except Exception:
433        pass
            
    441class CacheBackend(Protocol):
442    def get(self, key: str): ...
443
444    def set(self, key: str, data, ttl: Optional[int] = None): ...
445
446    def stats(self) -> dict: ...
            
    442    def get(self, key: str): ...
            
    444    def set(self, key: str, data, ttl: Optional[int] = None): ...
            
    446    def stats(self) -> dict: ...
            
    449class FileCache(CacheBackend):
450    def __init__(self):
451        os.makedirs(Config.CACHE_DIR, exist_ok=True)
452        self.hits = 0
453        self.misses = 0
454
455    def _get_cache_path(self, key: str) -> str:
456        hash_key = hashlib.md5(key.encode("utf-8")).hexdigest()
457        return os.path.join(Config.CACHE_DIR, f"{hash_key}.pkl.gz")
458
459    @backoff.on_exception(backoff.expo, Exception, max_tries=3)
460    def get(self, key: str):
461        cache_file = self._get_cache_path(key)
462        if os.path.exists(cache_file):
463            try:
464                with open(cache_file, "rb") as f:
465                    compressed_data = f.read()
466                data = pickle.loads(zlib.decompress(compressed_data))
467                self.hits += 1
468                return data
469            except Exception as e:
470                logger.warning(f"Erro ao ler cache {key}: {e}")
471                os.remove(cache_file)
472
473        self.misses += 1
474        return None
475
476    @backoff.on_exception(backoff.expo, Exception, max_tries=3)
477    def set(self, key: str, data, ttl: Optional[int] = None):
478        cache_file = self._get_cache_path(key)
479        try:
480            compressed_data = zlib.compress(pickle.dumps(data))
481            temp_file = cache_file + ".tmp"
482            with open(temp_file, "wb") as f:
483                f.write(compressed_data)
484            os.replace(temp_file, cache_file)
485        except Exception as e:
486            logger.error(f"Erro ao salvar cache {key}: {e}")
487            if os.path.exists(temp_file):
488                os.remove(temp_file)
489
490    def stats(self) -> dict:
491        return {
492            "hits": self.hits,
493            "misses": self.misses,
494            "hit_rate": (
495                self.hits / (self.hits + self.misses)
496                if (self.hits + self.misses) > 0
497                else 0
498            ),
499        }

470                logger.warning(f"Erro ao ler cache {key}: {e}")
471                os.remove(cache_file)
472
473        self.misses += 1
474        return None

    502class RedisCache(CacheBackend):
503    def __init__(self, url: str):
504        try:
505            import redis  # type: ignore
506        except Exception as exc:  # pragma: no cover - import error
507            raise ImportError("redis package required for RedisCache") from exc
508
509        self.client = redis.Redis.from_url(url)
510        self.hits = 0
511        self.misses = 0
512
513    def get(self, key: str):
514        val = self.client.get(key)
515        if val is not None:
516            try:
517                data = pickle.loads(zlib.decompress(val))
518            except Exception:
519                self.client.delete(key)
520                self.misses += 1
521                return None
522            self.hits += 1
523            return data
524        self.misses += 1
525        return None
526
527    def set(self, key: str, data, ttl: Optional[int] = None):
528        val = zlib.compress(pickle.dumps(data))
529        if ttl:
530            self.client.setex(key, ttl, val)
531        else:
532            self.client.set(key, val)
533
534    def stats(self) -> dict:
535        return {
536            "hits": self.hits,
537            "misses": self.misses,
538            "hit_rate": (
539                self.hits / (self.hits + self.misses)
540                if (self.hits + self.misses) > 0
541                else 0
542            ),
543        }

    546class SQLiteCache(CacheBackend):
547    def __init__(self, path: str):
548        os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(path), exist_ok=True)
549        self.conn = sqlite3.connect(path, check_same_thread=False)
550        self.conn.execute(
551            "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cache (key TEXT PRIMARY KEY, value BLOB, expires_at INTEGER)"
552        )
553        self.hits = 0
554        self.misses = 0
555
556    def get(self, key: str):
557        cur = self.conn.execute(
558            "SELECT value, expires_at FROM cache WHERE key=?", (key,)
559        )
560        row = cur.fetchone()
561        if row:
562            value, exp = row
563            if exp is not None and exp < int(time.time()):
564                self.conn.execute("DELETE FROM cache WHERE key=?", (key,))
565                self.conn.commit()
566                self.misses += 1
567                return None
568            try:
569                data = pickle.loads(zlib.decompress(value))
570            except Exception:
571                self.conn.execute("DELETE FROM cache WHERE key=?", (key,))
572                self.conn.commit()
573                self.misses += 1
574                return None
575            self.hits += 1
576            return data
577        self.misses += 1
578        return None
579
580    def set(self, key: str, data, ttl: Optional[int] = None):
581        val = zlib.compress(pickle.dumps(data))
582        exp = int(time.time()) + ttl if ttl else None
583        self.conn.execute(
584            "REPLACE INTO cache (key, value, expires_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?)",
585            (key, val, exp),
586        )
587        self.conn.commit()
588
589    def stats(self) -> dict:
590        return {
591            "hits": self.hits,
592            "misses": self.misses,
593            "hit_rate": (
594                self.hits / (self.hits + self.misses)
595                if (self.hits + self.misses) > 0
596                else 0
597            ),
598        }

    601def init_cache() -> CacheBackend:
602    if Config.CACHE_BACKEND == "redis":
603        return RedisCache(Config.REDIS_URL)
604    if Config.CACHE_BACKEND == "sqlite":
605        return SQLiteCache(Config.SQLITE_PATH)
606    return FileCache()
            
    612def clear_cache() -> None:
613    """Remove arquivos ou registros expirados do cache."""
614    ttl = Config.CACHE_TTL
615    if Config.CACHE_BACKEND == "sqlite":
616        if not os.path.exists(Config.SQLITE_PATH):
617            return
618        conn = sqlite3.connect(Config.SQLITE_PATH)
619        conn.execute(
620            "DELETE FROM cache WHERE expires_at IS NOT NULL AND expires_at < ?",
621            (int(time.time()),),
622        )
623        conn.commit()
624        conn.close()
625    elif Config.CACHE_BACKEND == "file":
626        if ttl is None:
627            return
628        cutoff = time.time() - ttl
629        path = Path(Config.CACHE_DIR)
630        if path.exists():
631            for p in path.glob("*.pkl.gz"):
632                if p.stat().st_mtime < cutoff:
633                    p.unlink()
634    else:
635        # Redis remove chaves expiradas automaticamente
636        pass

    648class NLPProcessor:
649    _instances = {}
650
651    @classmethod
652    def get_instance(cls, lang: str):
653        if lang not in cls._instances:
654            if lang in Config.NLP_MODELS:
655                try:
656                    cls._instances[lang] = spacy.load(Config.NLP_MODELS[lang])
657                    logger.info(f"Carregado modelo NLP para {lang}")
658                except OSError:
659                    logger.warning(
660                        f"Modelo NLP para {lang} não encontrado, tentando modelo pequeno"
661                    )
662                    try:
663                        cls._instances[lang] = spacy.load(
664                            Config.NLP_MODELS[lang].replace("_lg", "_sm")
665                        )
666                    except OSError:
667                        logger.warning(
668                            f"Modelos lg e sm para {lang} indisponíveis, usando 'en_core_web_sm'"
669                        )
670                        cls._instances[lang] = spacy.load("en_core_web_sm")
671            else:
672                logger.warning(f"Modelo NLP para {lang} não configurado, usando inglês")
673                cls._instances[lang] = spacy.load(Config.NLP_MODELS["en"])
674        return cls._instances[lang]
675
676    @classmethod
677    def get_embedding_model(cls):
678        if not hasattr(cls, "_embedding_model"):
679            cls._embedding_model = SentenceTransformer(Config.EMBEDDING_MODEL)
680        return cls._embedding_model

    683def extract_keywords(text: str, lang: str = "en", n: int = 10) -> List[str]:
684    try:
685        nlp = NLPProcessor.get_instance(lang)
686        doc = nlp(text)
687
688        # Filtra substantivos e nomes próprios
689        keywords = [
690            chunk.text for chunk in doc.noun_chunks if len(chunk.text.split()) <= 3
691        ]
692
693        # Remove duplicatas e conta frequência
694        freq = {}
695        for word in keywords:
696            word_lower = word.lower()
697            if word_lower in freq:
698                freq[word_lower] += 1
699            else:
700                freq[word_lower] = 1
701
702        # Ordena por frequência e pega os top N
703        sorted_keywords = sorted(freq.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
704        return [kw[0] for kw in sorted_keywords[:n]]
705
706    except Exception as e:
707        logger.error(f"Erro ao extrair keywords: {e}")
708        return []
            
    711def summarize_text(text: str, lang: str = "en") -> str:
712    try:
713        parser = PlaintextParser.from_string(text, Tokenizer(lang))
714        summarizer = LsaSummarizer()
715        summary = summarizer(parser.document, Config.SUMMARY_SENTENCES)
716        return " ".join([str(sentence) for sentence in summary])
717    except Exception as e:
718        logger.error(f"Erro ao sumarizar texto: {e}")
719        return (
720            text[: Config.MIN_TEXT_LENGTH]
721            if len(text) > Config.MIN_TEXT_LENGTH
722            else text
723        )
            
    726def cluster_texts(texts: List[str], k: int = Config.CLUSTER_K) -> np.ndarray:
727    try:
728        model = NLPProcessor.get_embedding_model()
729        embeddings = model.encode(texts, show_progress_bar=False)
730
731        # Normaliza os embeddings
732        norms = np.linalg.norm(embeddings, axis=1, keepdims=True)
733        normalized_embeddings = embeddings / norms
734
735        # Clusteriza usando K-means
736        kmeans = KMeans(n_clusters=k, random_state=42)
737        clusters = kmeans.fit_predict(normalized_embeddings)
738
739        return clusters
740    except Exception as e:
741        logger.error(f"Erro no clustering: {e}")
742        return np.zeros(len(texts))
            
    748def advanced_clean_text(
749    text: str,
750    lang: str = "en",
751    remove_stopwords: bool = False,
752    split: bool = False,
753    stem: bool = False,
754) -> str | list[str]:
755    """Clean wiki text with optional stopword removal, stemming and sentence splitting."""
756    try:
757        text = clean_wiki_text(text)
758
759        # Remove caracteres especiais, mantendo acentos quando relevante
760        if lang in ["en", "de"]:
761            text = unidecode(text)
762
763        # Remove padrões específicos da Wikipedia
764        text = re.sub(r"\[\d+\]", "", text)  # Referências [1], [2], etc.
765        text = re.sub(
766            r"\b(ver também|see also|véase también|voir aussi)\b.*",
767            "",
768            text,
769            flags=re.IGNORECASE,
770        )
771        text = re.sub(r"\{\|.*?\|\}", "", text, flags=re.DOTALL)  # Remove tables
772
773        # Remove seções específicas
774        sections_to_remove = [
775            "referências",
776            "references",
777            "referencias",
778            "bibliografia",
779            "bibliography",
780            "bibliografía",
781            "ligações externas",
782            "external links",
783            "enlaces externos",
784        ]
785        for section in sections_to_remove:
786            text = re.sub(
787                rf"==\s*{section}\s*==.*", "", text, flags=re.IGNORECASE | re.DOTALL
788            )
789
790        if remove_stopwords or stem:
791            removed = False
792            try:
793                nlp = NLPProcessor.get_instance(lang)
794                doc = nlp(text)
795                tokens = []
796                for t in doc:
797                    if remove_stopwords and getattr(t, "is_stop", False):
798                        continue
799                    tokens.append(t.lemma_ if stem else t.text)
800                text = " ".join(tokens)
801                removed = True
802            except Exception as e:
803                logger.error(f"Erro ao processar texto com spaCy: {e}")
804            if not removed:
805                try:
806                    import nltk
807                    from nltk.corpus import stopwords
808                    from nltk.stem import SnowballStemmer, PorterStemmer
809
810                    stop_words = set()
811                    if remove_stopwords:
812                        stop_words = set(stopwords.words(lang))
813                    if stem:
814                        try:
815                            stemmer = SnowballStemmer(lang)
816                        except Exception:
817                            stemmer = PorterStemmer()
818                    tokens = []
819                    for w in text.split():
820                        if remove_stopwords and w.lower() in stop_words:
821                            continue
822                        if stem:
823                            tokens.append(stemmer.stem(w))
824                        else:
825                            tokens.append(w)
826                    text = " ".join(tokens)
827                except Exception as e:
828                    logger.error(f"Erro ao processar texto com NLTK: {e}")
829
830        text = text.strip()
831        if split:
832            return split_sentences(text, lang)
833        return text
834    except Exception as e:
835        logger.error(f"Erro na limpeza de texto: {e}")
836        return text
            
    839def extract_main_content(page_html: str) -> str:
840    try:
841        soup = BeautifulSoup(page_html, "html.parser")
842
843        # Remove elementos indesejados
844        for element in soup.find_all(
845            [
846                "table",
847                "div.infobox",
848                "span.reference",
849                "ol.references",
850                "div.navbox",
851                "div.hatnote",
852                "div.thumb",
853                "div.notice",
854            ]
855        ):
856            element.decompose()
857
858        # Extrai conteúdo principal
859        content_div = soup.find("div", {"id": "mw-content-text"})
860        if content_div:
861            return str(content_div)
862        return page_html
863    except Exception as e:
864        logger.error(f"Erro ao extrair conteúdo principal: {e}")
865        return page_html
            
    868def extract_links(html: str, base_url: str) -> List[str]:
869    """Return absolute links from ``html`` that contain ``/wiki/`` in the href."""
870    try:
871        soup = BeautifulSoup(html, "html.parser")
872        links = []
873        for a in soup.find_all("a", href=True):
874            href = a["href"]
875            if "/wiki/" in href:
876                links.append(urljoin(base_url, href))
877        return links
878    except Exception as e:
879        logger.error(f"Erro ao extrair links: {e}")
880        return []
            
    883def extract_infobox(html: str) -> Dict[str, str]:
884    """Return a dictionary with key/value pairs from the first infobox table."""
885    try:
886        soup = BeautifulSoup(html, "html.parser")
887        box = soup.find("table", class_=lambda c: c and "infobox" in c)
888        if not box:
889            return {}
890        data: Dict[str, str] = {}
891        for row in box.find_all("tr"):
892            header = row.find("th")
893            value = row.find("td")
894            if header and value:
895                key = header.get_text(strip=True)
896                val = value.get_text(strip=True)
897                data[key] = val
898        return data
899    except Exception as e:
900        logger.error(f"Erro ao extrair infobox: {e}")
901        return {}
            
    904def extract_tables(html: str) -> List[List[List[str]]]:
905    """Return all HTML tables as lists of rows and cells."""
906    try:
907        soup = BeautifulSoup(html, "html.parser")
908        tables: List[List[List[str]]] = []
909        for table in soup.find_all("table"):
910            rows: List[List[str]] = []
911            for tr in table.find_all("tr"):
912                cells = [c.get_text(strip=True) for c in tr.find_all(["th", "td"])]
913                if cells:
914                    rows.append(cells)
915            if rows:
916                tables.append(rows)
917        return tables
918    except Exception as e:
919        logger.error(f"Erro ao extrair tabelas: {e}")
920        return []
            
    923def extract_images(html: str) -> List[Dict[str, str]]:
924    """Return image URLs and captions from thumbnail/figure elements."""
925    try:
926        soup = BeautifulSoup(html, "html.parser")
927        results: List[Dict[str, str]] = []
928
929        for div in soup.find_all("div", class_=lambda c: c and "thumb" in c.split()):
930            img = div.find("img")
931            if not img or not img.get("src"):
932                continue
933            url = img["src"]
934            if url.startswith("//"):
935                url = "https:" + url
936            caption_tag = div.find(class_="thumbcaption")
937            caption = caption_tag.get_text(strip=True) if caption_tag else ""
938            results.append({"image_url": url, "caption": caption})
939
940        for fig in soup.find_all("figure"):
941            img = fig.find("img")
942            if not img or not img.get("src"):
943                continue
944            url = img["src"]
945            if url.startswith("//"):
946                url = "https:" + url
947            caption_tag = fig.find("figcaption")
948            caption = caption_tag.get_text(strip=True) if caption_tag else ""
949            results.append({"image_url": url, "caption": caption})
950
951        return results
952    except Exception as e:
953        logger.error(f"Erro ao extrair imagens: {e}")
954        return []
            
     957async def fetch_with_retry(
 958    url: str,
 959    *,
 960    params: dict | None = None,
 961    headers: dict | None = None,
 962    retries: int = Config.RETRIES,
 963    proxy: str | None = None,
 964) -> tuple[int, str]:
 965    """Fetch a URL using ``aiohttp`` with automatic retries and logging."""
 966
 967    if proxy is None and Config.PROXIES:
 968        proxy = get_next_proxy()
 969
 970    for attempt in range(1, retries + 1):
 971        try:
 972            timeout = aiohttp.ClientTimeout(total=Config.TIMEOUT)
 973            acquired_dummy = False
 974            if (
 975                hasattr(fetch_semaphore, "active")
 976                and hasattr(fetch_semaphore, "limit")
 977                and not hasattr(fetch_semaphore, "acquire")
 978            ):
 979                while fetch_semaphore.active >= fetch_semaphore.limit:
 980                    await asyncio.sleep(0)
 981                await fetch_semaphore.__aenter__()
 982                acquired_dummy = True
 983            else:
 984                await fetch_semaphore.acquire()
 985            try:
 986                async with aiohttp.ClientSession(timeout=timeout) as session:
 987                    async with session.get(
 988                        url, params=params, headers=headers, proxy=proxy
 989                    ) as resp:
 990                        if resp.status == 429:
 991                            metrics.scrape_block.inc()
 992                        if 500 <= resp.status < 600:
 993                            raise aiohttp.ClientResponseError(
 994                                resp.request_info,
 995                                resp.history,
 996                                status=resp.status,
 997                                message=resp.reason,
 998                                headers=resp.headers,
 999                            )
1000                        resp.raise_for_status()
1001                        rate_limiter.record_success()
1002                        return resp.status, await resp.text()
1003            finally:
1004                if acquired_dummy:
1005                    await fetch_semaphore.__aexit__(None, None, None)
1006                else:
1007                    fetch_semaphore.release()
1008        except aiohttp.ClientResponseError as e:
1009            if getattr(e, "status", None) == 429:
1010                logger.warning(f"HTTP 429 for {url}, backing off")
1011                rate_limiter.record_error()
1012            else:
1013                logger.warning(f"Attempt {attempt} failed for {url}: {e}")
1014            exc = e
1015        except asyncio.TimeoutError as e:
1016            logger.warning(f"Timeout while fetching {url}")
1017            rate_limiter.record_error()
1018            exc = e
1019        except Exception as e:
1020            logger.warning(f"Attempt {attempt} failed for {url}: {e}")
1021            exc = e
1022        if attempt < retries:
1023            metrics.request_retries_total.inc()
1024            await asyncio.sleep(2)
1025        else:
1026            log_failed_url(url)
1027            metrics.requests_failed_total.inc()
1028            raise exc
            
    1031def fetch_html_content(title: str, lang: str) -> str:
1032    """Retrieve the raw HTML for a Wikipedia page using the REST API."""
1033
1034    return asyncio.run(fetch_html_content_async(title, lang))
            
    1037async def fetch_html_content_async(title: str, lang: str) -> str:
1038    """Asynchronous version of :func:`fetch_html_content`."""
1039    cache_key = f"html_{lang}_{title}"
1040    cached = cache.get(cache_key)
1041
1042    url = f"{get_base_url(lang)}/api/rest_v1/page/html/{title}"
1043    headers = {"User-Agent": Config.get_random_user_agent()}
1044
1045    try:
1046        await rate_limiter.async_wait()
1047        _, html = await fetch_with_retry(url, headers=headers)
1048        metrics.scrape_success.inc()
1049        cache.set(cache_key, html, ttl=Config.CACHE_TTL)
1050        return html
1051    except Exception as e:
1052        metrics.scrape_error.inc()
1053        logger.error(f"Erro ao buscar HTML para {title}: {e}")
1054        if cached is not None:
1055            return cached
1056        return ""
            
    1059async def fetch_all(urls: List[str]) -> List[str]:
1060    """Fetch multiple URLs concurrently using ``fetch_with_retry``."""
1061    results = await asyncio.gather(*(fetch_with_retry(u) for u in urls))
1062    return [text for _, text in results]
            
    1065def search_category(keyword: str, lang: str) -> Optional[str]:
1066    """Search for a similar category name using the Wikipedia API."""
1067    cache_key = f"search_category_{lang}_{keyword}"
1068    cached = cache.get(cache_key)
1069    if cached is not None:
1070        return cached
1071
1072    url = f"{get_base_url(lang)}/w/api.php"
1073    params = {
1074        "action": "query",
1075        "list": "search",
1076        "srnamespace": 14,
1077        "srsearch": keyword,
1078        "format": "json",
1079    }
1080
1081    async def _async_search() -> Optional[str]:
1082        await rate_limiter.async_wait()
1083        status, text = await fetch_with_retry(
1084            url, params=params, headers={"User-Agent": Config.get_random_user_agent()}
1085        )
1086        if status == 429:
1087            rate_limiter.record_error()
1088        data = json.loads(text)
1089        results = data.get("query", {}).get("search", [])
1090        if results:
1091            title = results[0].get("title", "")
1092            title = title.replace("Category:", "").replace("Categoria:", "")
1093            cache.set(cache_key, title, ttl=Config.CACHE_TTL)
1094            return title
1095        return None
1096
1097    try:
1098        return asyncio.run(_async_search()) or cache.get(cache_key)
1099    except Exception as e:  # pragma: no cover - network issues
1100        rate_limiter.record_error()
1101        logger.error(f"Erro ao buscar categorias para {keyword}: {e}")
1102        return cache.get(cache_key)
            
    1105def get_revision_history(title: str, lang: str, limit: int) -> List[dict]:
1106    """Return revision metadata for a page using the Wikipedia API."""
1107
1108    cache_key = f"revisions_{lang}_{title}_{limit}"
1109    cached = cache.get(cache_key)
1110    if cached is not None:
1111        return cached
1112
1113    url = f"{get_base_url(lang)}/w/api.php"
1114    params = {
1115        "action": "query",
1116        "prop": "revisions",
1117        "titles": title,
1118        "rvlimit": limit,
1119        "rvprop": "timestamp|user",
1120        "format": "json",
1121    }
1122
1123    @backoff.on_exception(
1124        backoff.expo,
1125        requests.exceptions.RequestException,
1126        max_tries=Config.RETRIES,
1127    )
1128    def _request() -> List[dict]:
1129        rate_limiter.wait()
1130        resp = requests.get(
1131            url,
1132            params=params,
1133            headers={"User-Agent": Config.get_random_user_agent()},
1134            timeout=Config.TIMEOUT,
1135        )
1136        resp.raise_for_status()
1137        data = resp.json()
1138        pages = data.get("query", {}).get("pages", {})
1139        revs: List[dict] = []
1140        for page in pages.values():
1141            for rev in page.get("revisions", []):
1142                revs.append(
1143                    {
1144                        "timestamp": rev.get("timestamp"),
1145                        "user": rev.get("user"),
1146                    }
1147                )
1148        return revs
1149
1150    try:
1151        revisions = _request()
1152        cache.set(cache_key, revisions, ttl=Config.CACHE_TTL)
1153        return revisions
1154    except Exception as e:  # pragma: no cover - network issues
1155        logger.error(f"Erro ao buscar revisões de {title}: {e}")
1156        fallback = cache.get(cache_key)
1157        if fallback is not None:
1158            return fallback
1159        return []
            
    1165class WikipediaAdvanced:
1166    def __init__(self, lang: str):
1167        self.lang = lang
1168        self.wiki = wikipediaapi.Wikipedia(
1169            language=lang,
1170            extract_format=wikipediaapi.ExtractFormat.HTML,
1171            user_agent=Config.get_random_user_agent(),
1172        )
1173        self.session = requests.Session()
1174        self.session.headers.update({"User-Agent": Config.get_random_user_agent()})
1175
1176    def _prepare_session(self):
1177        """Refresh User-Agent and proxy settings before a request."""
1178        self.session.headers["User-Agent"] = Config.get_random_user_agent()
1179        if Config.PROXIES:
1180            self.session.proxies = get_next_proxy()
1181        else:
1182            self.session.proxies = {}
1184    @backoff.on_exception(
1185        backoff.expo,
1186        (requests.exceptions.RequestException, wikipediaapi.WikipediaException),
1187        max_tries=Config.RETRIES,
1188    )
1189    def fetch_page(self, page_title: str) -> Optional[wikipediaapi.WikipediaPage]:
1190        cache_key = f"page_{self.lang}_{page_title}"
1191        cached = cache.get(cache_key)
1192        if cached is not None:
1193            return cached
1194
1195        self._prepare_session()
1196        rate_limiter.wait()
1197
1198        try:
1199            page = self.wiki.page(page_title)
1200            if page.exists():
1201                # Melhora a qualidade do conteúdo
1202                page._fullurl = self.wiki.api.article_url(page_title)
1203                rate_limiter.wait()
1204                page._html = fetch_html_content(page_title, self.lang)
1205                page._html = extract_main_content(page._html)
1206
1207                cache.set(cache_key, page, ttl=Config.CACHE_TTL)
1208                return page
1209        except Exception as e:
1210            rate_limiter.record_error()
1211            logger.error(f"Erro ao buscar página {page_title}: {e}")
1212            log_failed_url(self.wiki.api.article_url(page_title))
1213            raise
1214
1215        return None
1216
1217    async def fetch_page_async(
1218        self, page_title: str
1219    ) -> Optional[wikipediaapi.WikipediaPage]:
1220        """Asynchronous version of :meth:`fetch_page` using ``aiohttp``."""
1221        cache_key = f"page_{self.lang}_{page_title}"
1222        cached = cache.get(cache_key)
1223        if cached is not None:
1224            return cached
1225
1226        await rate_limiter.async_wait()
1227
1228        try:
1229            page = await asyncio.to_thread(self.wiki.page, page_title)
1230            if page.exists():
1231                page._fullurl = self.wiki.api.article_url(page_title)
1232                await rate_limiter.async_wait()
1233                page._html = await fetch_html_content_async(page_title, self.lang)
1234                page._html = extract_main_content(page._html)
1235                cache.set(cache_key, page, ttl=Config.CACHE_TTL)
1236                return page
1237        except Exception as e:
1238            rate_limiter.record_error()
1239            logger.error(f"Erro ao buscar página {page_title}: {e}")
1240            log_failed_url(self.wiki.api.article_url(page_title))
1241            raise
1242
1243        return None
1244
1245    @backoff.on_exception(
1246        backoff.expo,
1247        (requests.exceptions.RequestException, wikipediaapi.WikipediaException),
1248        max_tries=Config.RETRIES,
1249    )
1250    def fetch_category(
1251        self, category_name: str
1252    ) -> Optional[wikipediaapi.WikipediaPage]:
1253        category_title = (
1254            f"Category:{category_name}"
1255            if self.lang != "pt"
1256            else f"Categoria:{category_name}"
1257        )
1258        self._prepare_session()
1259        rate_limiter.wait()
1260        return self.fetch_page(category_title)
1262    def get_links_from_category_page(self, category_name: str) -> List[str]:
1263        """Return wiki links from the HTML of a category page."""
1264        try:
1265            title = (
1266                f"Category:{category_name}"
1267                if self.lang != "pt"
1268                else f"Categoria:{category_name}"
1269            )
1270            html = fetch_html_content(title, self.lang)
1271            base_url = get_base_url(self.lang)
1272            return extract_links(html, base_url)
1273        except Exception as e:
1274            logger.error(f"Erro ao obter links da categoria {category_name}: {e}")
1275            return []
1276
1277    def get_related_pages(self, page_title: str, limit: int = 10) -> List[dict]:
1278        cache_key = f"related_{self.lang}_{page_title}"
1279        cached = cache.get(cache_key)
1280        if cached is not None:
1281            return cached
1282
1283        self._prepare_session()
1284
1285        @backoff.on_exception(
1286            backoff.expo,
1287            (requests.exceptions.RequestException, wikipediaapi.WikipediaException),
1288            max_tries=Config.RETRIES,
1289        )
1290        def _request():
1291            url = f"{get_base_url(self.lang)}/w/api.php"
1292            params = {
1293                "action": "query",
1294                "titles": page_title,
1295                "prop": "links",
1296                "pllimit": limit,
1297                "format": "json",
1298            }
1299            rate_limiter.wait()
1300            response = self.session.get(url, params=params, timeout=Config.TIMEOUT)
1301            response.raise_for_status()
1302            return response.json()
1303
1304        try:
1305            data = _request()
1307            pages = data.get("query", {}).get("pages", {})
1308            links = []
1309
1310            for page in pages.values():
1311                for link in page.get("links", []):
1312                    if "ns" in link and link["ns"] == 0:  # Only main namespace
1313                        links.append({"title": link["title"], "lang": self.lang})
1314
1315            cache.set(cache_key, links, ttl=Config.CACHE_TTL)
1316            return links
1317        except Exception as e:
1318            logger.error(f"Erro ao buscar páginas relacionadas para {page_title}: {e}")
1319            log_failed_url(f"{get_base_url(self.lang)}/w/api.php")
1320            fallback = cache.get(cache_key)
1321            if fallback is not None:
1322                return fallback
1323            return []
1324
1325    def get_revision_history(self, page_title: str, limit: int = 5) -> List[dict]:
1326        """Wrapper around :func:`get_revision_history` for this language."""
1327
1328        return get_revision_history(page_title, self.lang, limit)
1329
1330    def get_category_members(
1331        self, category_name: str, depth: int = 0, visited: Optional[Set[str]] = None
1332    ) -> List[dict]:
1333        if visited is None:
1334            visited = set()
1335
1336        category = self.fetch_category(category_name)
1337        if not category or not category.exists():
1338            alt = search_category(category_name, self.lang)
1339            if alt:
1340                category_name = alt
1341                category = self.fetch_category(category_name)
1342
1343        if not category or not category.exists():
1344            logger.warning(f"Categoria não encontrada: {category_name}")
1345            return []
1346
1347        members = []
1348        for member in category.categorymembers.values():
1349            if member.title not in visited:
1350                visited.add(member.title)
1351
1352                if (
1353                    member.ns == wikipediaapi.Namespace.CATEGORY
1354                    and depth < Config.MAX_DEPTH
1355                ):
1356                    sub_members = self.get_category_members(
1357                        member.title.replace("Category:", "").replace("Categoria:", ""),
1358                        depth + 1,
1359                        visited,
1360                    )
1361                    members.extend(sub_members)
1362                elif member.ns == wikipediaapi.Namespace.MAIN:
1363                    members.append(
1364                        {
1365                            "title": member.title,
1366                            "url": member.fullurl,
1367                            "lang": self.lang,
1368                            "category": category_name,
1369                            "depth": depth,
1370                        }
1371                    )
1372
1373                if len(members) >= Config.MAX_PAGES_PER_CATEGORY:
1374                    break
1376        return members
1377
1378    async def get_category_members_async(
1379        self,
1380        category_name: str,
1381        depth: int = 0,
1382        visited: Optional[Set[str]] = None,
1383        max_concurrency: Optional[int] = None,
1384    ) -> List[dict]:
1385        """Asynchronously fetch category members recursively."""
1386        if visited is None:
1387            visited = set()
1388
1389        max_concurrency = max_concurrency or Config.MAX_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS
1390        sem = asyncio.Semaphore(max_concurrency)
1391
1392        category = await asyncio.to_thread(self.fetch_category, category_name)
1393        if not category or not category.exists():
1394            alt = search_category(category_name, self.lang)
1395            if alt:
1396                category_name = alt
1397                category = await asyncio.to_thread(self.fetch_category, category_name)
1398
1399        if not category or not category.exists():
1400            logger.warning(f"Categoria não encontrada: {category_name}")
1401            return []
1402
1403        members: List[dict] = []
1404
1405        async def handle_member(member):
1406            if member.title in visited:
1407                return []
1408            visited.add(member.title)
1410            if (
1411                member.ns == wikipediaapi.Namespace.CATEGORY
1412                and depth < Config.MAX_DEPTH
1413            ):
1414                async with sem:
1415                    return await self.get_category_members_async(
1416                        member.title.replace("Category:", "").replace("Categoria:", ""),
1417                        depth + 1,
1418                        visited,
1419                        max_concurrency,
1420                    )
1421            elif member.ns == wikipediaapi.Namespace.MAIN:
1422                return [
1423                    {
1424                        "title": member.title,
1425                        "url": member.fullurl,
1426                        "lang": self.lang,
1427                        "category": category_name,
1428                        "depth": depth,
1429                    }
1430                ]
1431            return []
1432
1433        tasks = [handle_member(m) for m in category.categorymembers.values()]
1434        for res in await asyncio.gather(*tasks):
1435            members.extend(res)
1436            if len(members) >= Config.MAX_PAGES_PER_CATEGORY:
1437                break
1438
1439        return members
1440
1441    def crawl_links(
1442        self,
1443        start_page: str,
1444        depth: int = 1,
1445        visited: Optional[Set[str]] = None,
1446    ) -> List[dict]:
1447        """Breadth-first crawl of ``/wiki/`` links starting from ``start_page``.
1448
1449        Parameters
1450        ----------
1451        start_page: str
1452            Title of the initial page to crawl.
1453        depth: int
1454            Maximum link depth to follow.
1455        visited: Optional[Set[str]]
1456            Optional set of already visited titles to avoid repeats.
1457
1458        Returns
1459        -------
1460        List[dict]
1461            List of pages in the same format as :meth:`get_category_members`.
1462        """
1463        if visited is None:
1464            visited = set()
1465
1466        queue: List[Tuple[str, int]] = [(start_page, 0)]
1467        results: List[dict] = []
1468        base_url = get_base_url(self.lang)
1469
1470        while queue and len(results) < Config.MAX_PAGES_PER_CATEGORY:
1471            current, cur_depth = queue.pop(0)
1472            if current in visited:
1473                continue
1474            visited.add(current)
1475
1476            try:
1477                html = fetch_html_content(current, self.lang)
1478                links = extract_links(html, base_url)
1479            except Exception as e:
1480                logger.error(f"Erro ao rastrear links de {current}: {e}")
1481                continue
1482
1483            for link in links:
1484                if len(results) >= Config.MAX_PAGES_PER_CATEGORY:
1485                    break
1486                parsed = urlparse(link)
1487                if "/wiki/" not in parsed.path:
1488                    continue
1489                title = parsed.path.split("/wiki/")[-1]
1490                title = requests.utils.unquote(title).replace("_", " ")
1491                if title in visited:
1492                    continue
1493                results.append(
1494                    {
1495                        "title": title,
1496                        "url": link,
1497                        "lang": self.lang,
1498                        "category": start_page,
1499                        "depth": cur_depth,
1500                    }
1501                )
1502                if cur_depth < depth:
1503                    queue.append((title, cur_depth + 1))
1505        return results
1506
1507    async def crawl_links_async(
1508        self,
1509        start_page: str,
1510        depth: int = 1,
1511        visited: Optional[Set[str]] = None,
1512    ) -> List[dict]:
1513        """Asynchronous version of :meth:`crawl_links`."""
1514
1515        if visited is None:
1516            visited = set()
1517
1518        queue: List[Tuple[str, int]] = [(start_page, 0)]
1519        results: List[dict] = []
1520        base_url = get_base_url(self.lang)
1521
1522        while queue and len(results) < Config.MAX_PAGES_PER_CATEGORY:
1523            current, cur_depth = queue.pop(0)
1524            if current in visited:
1525                continue
1526            visited.add(current)
1527
1528            try:
1529                html = await fetch_html_content_async(current, self.lang)
1530                links = extract_links(html, base_url)
1531            except Exception as e:
1532                logger.error(f"Erro ao rastrear links de {current}: {e}")
1533                continue
1534
1535            for link in links:
1536                if len(results) >= Config.MAX_PAGES_PER_CATEGORY:
1537                    break
1538                parsed = urlparse(link)
1539                if "/wiki/" not in parsed.path:
1540                    continue
1541                title = parsed.path.split("/wiki/")[-1]
1542                title = requests.utils.unquote(title).replace("_", " ")
1543                if title in visited:
1544                    continue
1545                results.append(
1546                    {
1547                        "title": title,
1548                        "url": link,
1549                        "lang": self.lang,
1550                        "category": start_page,
1551                        "depth": cur_depth,
1552                    }
1553                )
1554                if cur_depth < depth:
1555                    queue.append((title, cur_depth + 1))
1556
1557        return results
            
    1166    def __init__(self, lang: str):
1167        self.lang = lang
1168        self.wiki = wikipediaapi.Wikipedia(
1169            language=lang,
1170            extract_format=wikipediaapi.ExtractFormat.HTML,
1171            user_agent=Config.get_random_user_agent(),
1172        )
1173        self.session = requests.Session()
1174        self.session.headers.update({"User-Agent": Config.get_random_user_agent()})
            
    1184    @backoff.on_exception(
1185        backoff.expo,
1186        (requests.exceptions.RequestException, wikipediaapi.WikipediaException),
1187        max_tries=Config.RETRIES,
1188    )
1189    def fetch_page(self, page_title: str) -> Optional[wikipediaapi.WikipediaPage]:
1190        cache_key = f"page_{self.lang}_{page_title}"
1191        cached = cache.get(cache_key)
1192        if cached is not None:
1193            return cached
1194
1195        self._prepare_session()
1196        rate_limiter.wait()
1197
1198        try:
1199            page = self.wiki.page(page_title)
1200            if page.exists():
1201                # Melhora a qualidade do conteúdo
1202                page._fullurl = self.wiki.api.article_url(page_title)
1203                rate_limiter.wait()
1204                page._html = fetch_html_content(page_title, self.lang)
1205                page._html = extract_main_content(page._html)
1206
1207                cache.set(cache_key, page, ttl=Config.CACHE_TTL)
1208                return page
1209        except Exception as e:
1210            rate_limiter.record_error()
1211            logger.error(f"Erro ao buscar página {page_title}: {e}")
1212            log_failed_url(self.wiki.api.article_url(page_title))
1213            raise
1214
1215        return None
            
    1217    async def fetch_page_async(
1218        self, page_title: str
1219    ) -> Optional[wikipediaapi.WikipediaPage]:
1220        """Asynchronous version of :meth:`fetch_page` using ``aiohttp``."""
1221        cache_key = f"page_{self.lang}_{page_title}"
1222        cached = cache.get(cache_key)
1223        if cached is not None:
1224            return cached
1225
1226        await rate_limiter.async_wait()
1227
1228        try:
1229            page = await asyncio.to_thread(self.wiki.page, page_title)
1230            if page.exists():
1231                page._fullurl = self.wiki.api.article_url(page_title)
1232                await rate_limiter.async_wait()
1233                page._html = await fetch_html_content_async(page_title, self.lang)
1234                page._html = extract_main_content(page._html)
1235                cache.set(cache_key, page, ttl=Config.CACHE_TTL)
1236                return page
1237        except Exception as e:
1238            rate_limiter.record_error()
1239            logger.error(f"Erro ao buscar página {page_title}: {e}")
1240            log_failed_url(self.wiki.api.article_url(page_title))
1241            raise
1242
1243        return None
            
    1245    @backoff.on_exception(
1246        backoff.expo,
1247        (requests.exceptions.RequestException, wikipediaapi.WikipediaException),
1248        max_tries=Config.RETRIES,
1249    )
1250    def fetch_category(
1251        self, category_name: str
1252    ) -> Optional[wikipediaapi.WikipediaPage]:
1253        category_title = (
1254            f"Category:{category_name}"
1255            if self.lang != "pt"
1256            else f"Categoria:{category_name}"
1257        )
1258        self._prepare_session()
1259        rate_limiter.wait()
1260        return self.fetch_page(category_title)
            
    1262    def get_links_from_category_page(self, category_name: str) -> List[str]:
1263        """Return wiki links from the HTML of a category page."""
1264        try:
1265            title = (
1266                f"Category:{category_name}"
1267                if self.lang != "pt"
1268                else f"Categoria:{category_name}"
1269            )
1270            html = fetch_html_content(title, self.lang)
1271            base_url = get_base_url(self.lang)
1272            return extract_links(html, base_url)
1273        except Exception as e:
1274            logger.error(f"Erro ao obter links da categoria {category_name}: {e}")

    1277    def get_related_pages(self, page_title: str, limit: int = 10) -> List[dict]:
1278        cache_key = f"related_{self.lang}_{page_title}"
1279        cached = cache.get(cache_key)
1280        if cached is not None:
1281            return cached
1282
1283        self._prepare_session()
1284
1285        @backoff.on_exception(
1286            backoff.expo,
1287            (requests.exceptions.RequestException, wikipediaapi.WikipediaException),
1288            max_tries=Config.RETRIES,
1289        )
1290        def _request():
1291            url = f"{get_base_url(self.lang)}/w/api.php"
1292            params = {
1293                "action": "query",
1294                "titles": page_title,
1295                "prop": "links",
1296                "pllimit": limit,
1297                "format": "json",
1298            }
1299            rate_limiter.wait()
1300            response = self.session.get(url, params=params, timeout=Config.TIMEOUT)
1301            response.raise_for_status()
1302            return response.json()
1303
1304        try:
1305            data = _request()
1306
1307            pages = data.get("query", {}).get("pages", {})
1308            links = []
1309
1310            for page in pages.values():
1311                for link in page.get("links", []):
1312                    if "ns" in link and link["ns"] == 0:  # Only main namespace
1313                        links.append({"title": link["title"], "lang": self.lang})
1314
1315            cache.set(cache_key, links, ttl=Config.CACHE_TTL)
1316            return links
1317        except Exception as e:
1318            logger.error(f"Erro ao buscar páginas relacionadas para {page_title}: {e}")
1319            log_failed_url(f"{get_base_url(self.lang)}/w/api.php")
1320            fallback = cache.get(cache_key)
1321            if fallback is not None:
1322                return fallback
1323            return []
            
    1325    def get_revision_history(self, page_title: str, limit: int = 5) -> List[dict]:
1326        """Wrapper around :func:`get_revision_history` for this language."""
1327
1328        return get_revision_history(page_title, self.lang, limit)
            
    1330    def get_category_members(
1331        self, category_name: str, depth: int = 0, visited: Optional[Set[str]] = None
1332    ) -> List[dict]:
1333        if visited is None:
1334            visited = set()
1335
1336        category = self.fetch_category(category_name)
1337        if not category or not category.exists():
1338            alt = search_category(category_name, self.lang)
1339            if alt:
1340                category_name = alt
1341                category = self.fetch_category(category_name)
1342
1343        if not category or not category.exists():
1344            logger.warning(f"Categoria não encontrada: {category_name}")
1345            return []
1346
1347        members = []
1348        for member in category.categorymembers.values():
1349            if member.title not in visited:
1350                visited.add(member.title)
1351
1352                if (
1353                    member.ns == wikipediaapi.Namespace.CATEGORY
1354                    and depth < Config.MAX_DEPTH
1355                ):
1356                    sub_members = self.get_category_members(
1357                        member.title.replace("Category:", "").replace("Categoria:", ""),
1358                        depth + 1,
1359                        visited,
1360                    )
1361                    members.extend(sub_members)
1362                elif member.ns == wikipediaapi.Namespace.MAIN:
1363                    members.append(
1364                        {
1365                            "title": member.title,
1366                            "url": member.fullurl,
1367                            "lang": self.lang,
1368                            "category": category_name,
1369                            "depth": depth,
1370                        }
1371                    )
1372
1373                if len(members) >= Config.MAX_PAGES_PER_CATEGORY:
1374                    break
1375
1376        return members
            
    1378    async def get_category_members_async(
1379        self,
1380        category_name: str,
1381        depth: int = 0,
1382        visited: Optional[Set[str]] = None,
1383        max_concurrency: Optional[int] = None,
1384    ) -> List[dict]:
1385        """Asynchronously fetch category members recursively."""
1386        if visited is None:
1387            visited = set()
1388
1389        max_concurrency = max_concurrency or Config.MAX_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS
1390        sem = asyncio.Semaphore(max_concurrency)
1391
1392        category = await asyncio.to_thread(self.fetch_category, category_name)
1393        if not category or not category.exists():
1394            alt = search_category(category_name, self.lang)
1395            if alt:
1396                category_name = alt
1397                category = await asyncio.to_thread(self.fetch_category, category_name)
1398
1399        if not category or not category.exists():
1400            logger.warning(f"Categoria não encontrada: {category_name}")
1401            return []
1402
1403        members: List[dict] = []
1404
1405        async def handle_member(member):
1406            if member.title in visited:
1407                return []
1408            visited.add(member.title)
1410            if (
1411                member.ns == wikipediaapi.Namespace.CATEGORY
1412                and depth < Config.MAX_DEPTH
1413            ):
1414                async with sem:
1415                    return await self.get_category_members_async(
1416                        member.title.replace("Category:", "").replace("Categoria:", ""),
1417                        depth + 1,
1418                        visited,
1419                        max_concurrency,
1420                    )
1421            elif member.ns == wikipediaapi.Namespace.MAIN:
1422                return [
1423                    {
1424                        "title": member.title,
1425                        "url": member.fullurl,
1426                        "lang": self.lang,
1427                        "category": category_name,
1428                        "depth": depth,
1429                    }
1430                ]
1431            return []
1432
1433        tasks = [handle_member(m) for m in category.categorymembers.values()]
1434        for res in await asyncio.gather(*tasks):
1435            members.extend(res)
1436            if len(members) >= Config.MAX_PAGES_PER_CATEGORY:
1437                break
1438
1439        return members
            
    1441    def crawl_links(
1442        self,
1443        start_page: str,
1444        depth: int = 1,
1445        visited: Optional[Set[str]] = None,
1446    ) -> List[dict]:
1447        """Breadth-first crawl of ``/wiki/`` links starting from ``start_page``.
1448
1449        Parameters
1450        ----------
1451        start_page: str
1452            Title of the initial page to crawl.
1453        depth: int
1454            Maximum link depth to follow.
1455        visited: Optional[Set[str]]
1456            Optional set of already visited titles to avoid repeats.
1457
1458        Returns
1459        -------
1460        List[dict]
1461            List of pages in the same format as :meth:`get_category_members`.
1462        """
1463        if visited is None:
1464            visited = set()
1465
1466        queue: List[Tuple[str, int]] = [(start_page, 0)]
1467        results: List[dict] = []
1468        base_url = get_base_url(self.lang)
1469
1470        while queue and len(results) < Config.MAX_PAGES_PER_CATEGORY:
1471            current, cur_depth = queue.pop(0)
1472            if current in visited:
1473                continue
1474            visited.add(current)
1475
1476            try:
1477                html = fetch_html_content(current, self.lang)
1478                links = extract_links(html, base_url)
1479            except Exception as e:
1480                logger.error(f"Erro ao rastrear links de {current}: {e}")
1481                continue
1482
1483            for link in links:
1484                if len(results) >= Config.MAX_PAGES_PER_CATEGORY:
1485                    break
1486                parsed = urlparse(link)
1487                if "/wiki/" not in parsed.path:
1488                    continue
1489                title = parsed.path.split("/wiki/")[-1]
1490                title = requests.utils.unquote(title).replace("_", " ")
1491                if title in visited:
1492                    continue
1493                results.append(
1494                    {
1495                        "title": title,
1496                        "url": link,
1497                        "lang": self.lang,
1498                        "category": start_page,
1499                        "depth": cur_depth,
1500                    }
1501                )
1502                if cur_depth < depth:
1503                    queue.append((title, cur_depth + 1))
1504
1505        return results
            
    1507    async def crawl_links_async(
1508        self,
1509        start_page: str,
1510        depth: int = 1,
1511        visited: Optional[Set[str]] = None,
1512    ) -> List[dict]:

1525                continue

1550                        "category": start_page,
