    1565def cpu_process_page(
1566    title: str,
1567    content: str,
1568    lang: str,
1569    category: str,
1570    images: List[Dict[str, str]] | None = None,
1571    revisions: List[dict] | None = None,
1572    rev_limit: int = 5,
1573) -> dict:
1574    """Executes CPU intensive operations for a page."""
1575    builder = DatasetBuilder(include_revisions=revisions, rev_limit=rev_limit)
1576    summary = summarize_text(content, lang)
1577    record = builder.generate_qa_pairs(
1578        title=title,
1579        content=content,
1580        summary=summary,
1581        lang=lang,
1582        category=category,
1583    )
1584    record["entities"] = extract_entities(content)
1585    if images is not None:
1586        record["images"] = images
1587    if revisions is not None:
1588        record.setdefault("metadata", {})["revisions"] = revisions
1589    return record
            
    1592class DatasetBuilder:
1593    def __init__(
1594        self,
1595        include_revisions: bool = False,
1596        rev_limit: int = 5,
1597        min_complexity: int | None = None,
1598        max_complexity: int | None = None,
1599        **_,
1600    ):
1601        self.embedding_model = NLPProcessor.get_embedding_model()
1602        self.dataset = []
1603        self.qa_pairs = []
1604        self.pending_pages: List[dict] = []
1605        self.duplicates_removed = 0
1606        self.invalid_records = 0
1607        self.include_revisions = include_revisions
1608        self.rev_limit = rev_limit
1609        self.min_complexity = min_complexity
1610        self.max_complexity = max_complexity
1611
1612        # Load checkpoints if available
1613        pages_path = os.path.join(Config.LOG_DIR, "checkpoint_pages.json")
1614        data_path = os.path.join(Config.LOG_DIR, "checkpoint_data.json")
1615        if os.path.exists(data_path):
1616            try:
1617                with open(data_path, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
1618                    self.dataset = json.load(f)
1619            except Exception as e:  # pragma: no cover - corrupted file
1620                logger.error(f"Erro ao carregar {data_path}: {e}")
1621            else:
1622                try:
1623                    os.remove(data_path)
1624                except OSError:
1625                    pass
1626        if os.path.exists(pages_path):
1627            try:
1628                with open(pages_path, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
1629                    self.pending_pages = json.load(f)
1630            except Exception as e:  # pragma: no cover - corrupted file
1631                logger.error(f"Erro ao carregar {pages_path}: {e}")
1632            else:
1633                try:
1634                    os.remove(pages_path)
1635                except OSError:
1636                    pass
1637        if self.dataset or self.pending_pages:
1638            self._update_progress()
1639
1640    def _update_progress(self):
1641        """Update progress information in logs/progress.json"""
1642        try:
1643            os.makedirs(Config.LOG_DIR, exist_ok=True)
1644            progress_file = os.path.join(Config.LOG_DIR, "progress.json")
1645            temp_file = progress_file + ".tmp"
1647            clusters = sorted(
1648                {item.get("cluster") for item in self.dataset if "cluster" in item}
1649            )
1650            topics = sorted(
1651                {item.get("topic") for item in self.dataset if item.get("topic")}
1652            )
1653            languages = sorted(
1654                {item.get("language") for item in self.dataset if item.get("language")}
1655            )
1656            categories = sorted(
1657                {item.get("category") for item in self.dataset if item.get("category")}
1658            )
1659
1660            progress = {
1661                "pages_processed": len(self.dataset),
1662                "clusters": clusters,
1663                "topics": topics,
1664                "languages": languages,
1665                "categories": categories,
1666                "duplicates_removed": self.duplicates_removed,
1667                "invalid_records": self.invalid_records,
1668            }
1669
1670            with open(temp_file, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
1671                json.dump(progress, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
1672            os.replace(temp_file, progress_file)
1673
1674            data_path = os.path.join(Config.LOG_DIR, "checkpoint_data.json")
1675            pages_path = os.path.join(Config.LOG_DIR, "checkpoint_pages.json")
1676            with open(data_path + ".tmp", "w", encoding="utf-8") as df:
1677                json.dump(self.dataset, df, ensure_ascii=False)
1678            os.replace(data_path + ".tmp", data_path)
1679            with open(pages_path + ".tmp", "w", encoding="utf-8") as pf:
1680                json.dump(self.pending_pages, pf, ensure_ascii=False)
1681            os.replace(pages_path + ".tmp", pages_path)
1682        except Exception as e:
1683            logger.error(f"Erro ao atualizar progresso: {e}")
1684
1685    def process_page(
1686        self, page_info: dict, proc_executor: Optional[ProcessPoolExecutor] = None
1687    ) -> Optional[object]:
1688        start_time = time.perf_counter()
1689        try:
1690            wiki = WikipediaAdvanced(page_info["lang"])
1691            page = wiki.fetch_page(page_info["title"])
1692
1693            if not page or not page.exists():
1694                return None
1695
1696            # Extrai e limpa o texto
1697            raw_text = clean_text(page.text)
1698            clean_content = advanced_clean_text(
1699                raw_text,
1700                page_info["lang"],
1701                remove_stopwords=Config.REMOVE_STOPWORDS,
1702            )
1703
1704            if len(clean_content) < Config.MIN_TEXT_LENGTH:
1705                return None
1706
1707            if proc_executor:
1708                images = extract_images(getattr(page, "_html", ""))
1709                revisions = None
1710                if self.include_revisions:
1711                    revisions = wiki.get_revision_history(
1712                        page_info["title"], self.rev_limit
1713                    )
1714                return proc_executor.submit(
1715                    cpu_process_page,
1716                    page_info["title"],
1717                    clean_content,
1718                    page_info["lang"],
1719                    page_info.get("category", ""),
1720                    images,
1721                    revisions,
1722                    self.rev_limit,
1723                )
1724
1725            # Sumariza o conteúdo
1726            summary = summarize_text(clean_content, page_info["lang"])
1727
1728            # Gera QA pairs avançadas
1729            qa_data = self.generate_qa_pairs(
1730                title=page_info["title"],
1731                content=clean_content,
1732                summary=summary,
1733                lang=page_info["lang"],
1734                category=page_info.get("category", ""),
1735            )
1736            qa_data["entities"] = extract_entities(clean_content)
1737            images = extract_images(getattr(page, "_html", ""))
1738            qa_data["images"] = images
1739            if self.include_revisions:
1740                qa_data.setdefault("metadata", {})["revisions"] = (
1741                    wiki.get_revision_history(page_info["title"], self.rev_limit)
1742                )
1743            metrics.scrape_success.inc()
1744            metrics.pages_scraped_total.inc()
1745            return qa_data
1746        except Exception as e:
1747            metrics.scrape_error.inc()
1748            logger.error(f"Erro ao processar página {page_info.get('title', '')}: {e}")
1749            return None
1750        finally:
1751            metrics.page_processing_seconds.observe(time.perf_counter() - start_time)
1752
1753    async def process_page_async(
1754        self, page_info: dict, proc_executor: Optional[ProcessPoolExecutor] = None
1755    ) -> Optional[object]:
1756        """Asynchronous wrapper for :meth:`process_page`."""
1757        return await asyncio.to_thread(self.process_page, page_info, proc_executor)
1758
1759    def generate_qa_pairs(
1760        self,
1761        title: str,
1762        content: str,
1763        summary: str,
1764        lang: str,
1765        category: str,
1766        extra_metadata: dict | None = None,
1767    ) -> dict:
1768        raw_code = content
1769        code_lang = detect_programming_language(content)
1770        complexities = {}
1771        docstring = ""
1772        signature = ""
1773        problems: list[str] = []
1774        fixed_version = content
1775        parse_ok = True
1776        context_from_code = ""
1777        if code_lang != "unknown":
1778            parse_ok = parse_with_language(content, code_lang)
1779            context_from_code = extract_context_from_code(content, code_lang)
1780            if not parse_ok:
1781                return {}
1782            signature = parse_function_signature(content)
1783            try:
1784                tree = ast.parse(content)
1785                func = next(
1786                    (
1787                        n
1788                        for n in tree.body
1789                        if isinstance(n, (ast.FunctionDef, ast.AsyncFunctionDef))
1790                    ),
1791                    None,
1792                )
1793                if func:
1794                    ds = ast.get_docstring(func)
1795                    if ds:
1796                        docstring = docstring_to_google(ds)
1797            except Exception:
1798                pass
1799            content = normalize_indentation(remove_comments(content, code_lang))
1800            complexities = get_functions_complexity(content, code_lang)
1801            problems, fixed_version = scan_code(content)
1802            if self.min_complexity is not None and complexities:
1803                if max(complexities.values()) < self.min_complexity:
1804                    return {}
1805            if self.max_complexity is not None and complexities:
1806                if max(complexities.values()) > self.max_complexity:
1807                    return {}
1808        else:
1809            problems, fixed_version = scan_code(content)
1810
1811        # Extrai keywords para gerar perguntas variadas
1812        keywords = extract_keywords(content, lang)
1813
1814        tags = self._extract_tags(keywords, extra_metadata)
1815
1816        # Gera múltiplas perguntas baseadas no conteúdo
1817        questions = self._generate_questions(title, content, lang, keywords)
1818
1819        # Gera respostas completas
1820        answers = self._generate_answers(content, summary, lang)
1821
1822        # Relações semânticas básicas
1823        relations = extract_relations(content, lang)
1824        relations_regex = extract_relations_regex(content)
1825        relations.extend(r for r in relations_regex if r not in relations)
1826
1827        # Cria embeddings para busca semântica
1828        content_embedding = self.embedding_model.encode(
1829            content, show_progress_bar=False
1830        )
1831        summary_embedding = self.embedding_model.encode(
1832            summary, show_progress_bar=False
1833        )
1834
1835        # Classificação avançada de tópicos
1836        topic, subtopic = self._classify_topic(title, content, lang)
1837
1838        rec_id = hashlib.md5(f"{title}_{lang}".encode("utf-8")).hexdigest()
1839        diagram_path = ""
1840        if code_lang != "unknown":
1841            try:
1842                diagram_path = generate_diagram(
1843                    content, os.path.join(Config.LOG_DIR, "diagrams"), rec_id
1844                )
1845            except Exception:
1846                diagram_path = ""
1847        explanations = generate_explanations(content, lang)
1848        theory_links = link_theory(content)
1849
1850        record = {
1851            "id": rec_id,
1852            "title": title,
1853            "language": lang,
1854            "category": category,
1855            "topic": topic,
1856            "subtopic": subtopic,
1857            "keywords": keywords,
1858            "tags": tags,
1859            "content": content,
1860            "raw_code": raw_code if code_lang != "unknown" else "",
1861            "summary": summary,
1862            "context": context_from_code or summary,
1863            "problems": problems,
1864            "fixed_version": fixed_version,
1865            "lessons": extra_metadata.get("lessons", "") if extra_metadata else "",
1866            "origin_metrics": (
1867                extra_metadata.get("origin_metrics", {}) if extra_metadata else {}
1868            ),
1869            "challenge": (extra_metadata.get("challenge") if extra_metadata else None)
1870            or generate_challenge_prompt(problems),
1871            "content_embedding": content_embedding.tolist(),
1872            "summary_embedding": summary_embedding.tolist(),
1873            "quality_score": (
1874                extra_metadata.get("quality_score", 0.0) if extra_metadata else 0.0
1875            ),
1876            "quality": None,
1877            "reason": "",
1878            "quality_level": None,
1879            "quality_reason": "",
1880            "questions": questions,
1881            "answers": answers,
1882            "relations": relations,
1883            "tests": extra_metadata.get("tests", []) if extra_metadata else [],
1884            "docstring": docstring,
1885            "diagram_path": diagram_path,
1886            "theory_links": theory_links,
1887            "explanations": explanations,
1888            "created_at": datetime.utcnow().isoformat(),
1889            "metadata": {
1890                "length": len(content),
1891                "source": "wikipedia",
1892                "source_url": f"{get_base_url(lang)}/wiki/{title.replace(' ', '_')}",
1893            },
1894        }
1895
1896        try:
1897            from provenance.tracker import record_provenance
1899            prov = record_provenance(record["metadata"]["source_url"], content)
1900            record["metadata"].update(prov)
1901        except Exception:
1902            pass
1903
1904        # Determine quality classification when possible
1905        if extra_metadata:
1906            if any(
1907                k in extra_metadata for k in ["stars", "stargazers_count", "repository"]
1908            ):
1909                q, r = classify_github_repo(extra_metadata)
1910                record["quality"], record["reason"] = q, r
1911                record["quality_level"], record["quality_reason"] = q, r
1912            elif "score" in extra_metadata:
1913                q, r = classify_stackoverflow_answer(extra_metadata)
1914                record["quality"], record["reason"] = q, r
1915                record["quality_level"], record["quality_reason"] = q, r
1916        if record["quality"] is None:
1917            score = record.get("quality_score", 0.0)
1918            if score >= 5:
1919                q = "high"
1920            elif score >= 2:
1921                q = "medium"
1922            else:
1923                q = "low"
1924            record["quality"] = q
1925            record["quality_level"] = q
1926            record["reason"] = "quality score"
1927            record["quality_reason"] = "quality score"
1928        if code_lang != "unknown":
1929            record["metadata"]["code_language"] = code_lang
1930            if complexities:
1931                record["metadata"]["complexities"] = complexities
1932            if docstring:
1933                record["docstring"] = docstring
1934            if signature:
1935                record["signature"] = signature
1936        if extra_metadata:
1937            if "wikidata_id" in extra_metadata:
1938                record["wikidata_id"] = extra_metadata["wikidata_id"]
1939            if "image_url" in extra_metadata:
1940                record["image_url"] = extra_metadata["image_url"]
1941            if "discussion_links" in extra_metadata:
1942                record["discussion_links"] = extra_metadata["discussion_links"]
1943
1944        if "discussion_links" not in record:
1945            try:
1946                links = search_discussions(record["id"])
1947            except Exception:
1948                links = []
1949            record["discussion_links"] = links
1950        try:
1951            storage_sqlite.save_to_db(
1952                {"id": record["id"], "metadata": record.get("metadata", {})}
1953            )
1954        except Exception as e:
1955            logger.error(f"Erro ao salvar no SQLite: {e}")
1956        return record
1958    def _generate_questions(
1959        self, title: str, content: str, lang: str, keywords: List[str]
1960    ) -> List[dict]:
1961        questions = []
1962
1963        # Pergunta básica sobre o título
1964        base_question = {
1965            "text": self._translate_question(f"What is {title}?", lang),
1966            "type": "definition",
1967            "difficulty": "easy",
1968        }
1969        questions.append(base_question)
1970
1971        # Perguntas baseadas em keywords
1972        for keyword in keywords[:5]:  # Limita a 5 perguntas por keyword
1973            question_types = [
1974                (f"How does {keyword} relate to {title}?", "relation", "medium"),
1975                (f"What is the role of {keyword} in {title}?", "role", "medium"),
1976                (
1977                    f"Can you explain {keyword} in the context of {title}?",
1978                    "explanation",
1979                    "hard",
1980                ),
1981            ]
1982
1983            for q_text, q_type, q_diff in question_types:
1984                questions.append(
1985                    {
1986                        "text": self._translate_question(q_text, lang),
1987                        "type": q_type,
1988                        "difficulty": q_diff,
1989                    }
1990                )
1991
1992        # Perguntas baseadas em conteúdo (usando NLP)
1993        try:
1994            nlp = NLPProcessor.get_instance(lang)
1995            doc = nlp(content)
1996
1997            # Perguntas sobre entidades nomeadas
1998            for ent in doc.ents[:5]:  # Limita a 5 entidades
1999                if ent.label_ in ["PERSON", "ORG", "LOC", "PRODUCT"]:
2000                    questions.append(
2001                        {
2002                            "text": self._translate_question(
2003                                f"What is the significance of {ent.text} in {title}?",
2004                                lang,
2005                            ),
2006                            "type": "significance",
2007                            "difficulty": "medium",
2008                        }
2009                    )
2011            # Perguntas sobre verbos/ações
2012            for sent in doc.sents[:3]:  # Analisa as primeiras 3 sentenças
2013                root = [token for token in sent if token.dep_ == "ROOT"]
2014                if root:
2015                    verb = root[0].lemma_
2016                    questions.append(
2017                        {
2018                            "text": self._translate_question(
2019                                f"How does {title} {verb}?", lang
2020                            ),
2021                            "type": "process",
2022                            "difficulty": "hard",
2023                        }
2024                    )
2025        except Exception as e:
2026            logger.error(f"Erro ao gerar perguntas NLP para {title}: {e}")
2027
2028        return questions
2029
2030    def _generate_answers(self, content: str, summary: str, lang: str) -> List[dict]:
2031        answers = []
2032
2033        # Resposta resumida
2034        answers.append({"text": summary, "type": "summary", "length": "short"})
2035
2036        # Resposta completa
2037        answers.append(
2038            {
2039                "text": content[: Config.MAX_TEXT_LENGTH],  # Limita o tamanho
2040                "type": "detailed",
2041                "length": "long",
2042            }
2043        )
2044
2045        # Respostas específicas por parágrafo
2046        paragraphs = [p for p in content.split("\n") if len(p.strip()) > 0]
2047        for para in paragraphs[:3]:  # Limita a 3 parágrafos
2048            answers.append({"text": para, "type": "paragraph", "length": "medium"})
2049
2050        return answers
2051
2052    def _translate_question(self, question: str, lang: str) -> str:
2053        translations = {
2054            "pt": {
2055                "What is": "O que é",
2056                "How does": "Como",
2057                "relate to": "se relaciona com",
2058                "What is the role of": "Qual é o papel de",
2059                "Can you explain": "Você pode explicar",
2060                "in the context of": "no contexto de",
2061                "What is the significance of": "Qual é a importância de",
2062            },
2063            "es": {
2064                "What is": "Qué es",
2065                "How does": "Cómo",
2066                "relate to": "se relaciona con",
2067                "What is the role of": "Cuál es el papel de",
2068                "Can you explain": "Puedes explicar",
2069                "in the context of": "en el contexto de",
2070                "What is the significance of": "Cuál es la importancia de",
2072            "fr": {
2073                "What is": "Qu'est-ce que",
2074                "How does": "Comment",
2075                "relate to": "se rapporte à",
2076                "What is the role of": "Quel est le rôle de",
2077                "Can you explain": "Pouvez-vous expliquer",
2078                "in the context of": "dans le contexte de",
2079                "What is the significance of": "Quelle est l'importance de",
2080            },
2081        }
2082
2083        if lang in translations:
2084            for eng, trans in translations[lang].items():
2085                question = question.replace(eng, trans)
2086
2087        return question
2088

2090        title_lower = title.lower()

2174

2186    def _extract_tags(
2187        self, keywords: List[str], extra_metadata: dict | None
2188    ) -> List[dict]:
2189        """Return tags with optional explanation links."""
2190        if extra_metadata and extra_metadata.get("tags"):
2191            tag_links = extra_metadata.get("tag_links", {})
2192            return [
2193                {"tag": t, "link": tag_links.get(t)}
2194                for t in extra_metadata.get("tags", [])
2195            ]
2196        return [{"tag": kw, "link": None} for kw in keywords[:5]]

2198    def build_from_pages(
2199        self,
2200        pages: List[dict],
2201        progress_desc: str = "Processando páginas",
2202        use_queue: bool = False,
2203        client=None,
2204        pipeline_name: str | None = None,
2205    ) -> List[dict]:
2206        """Process pages locally or enfileira tarefas para processamento."""
2207        if self.pending_pages:
2208            pages = self.pending_pages
2209        else:
2210            self.pending_pages = pages.copy()
2211
2212        if client:
2213            futures = [client.submit(self.process_page, page) for page in pages]
2214            processed = 0
2215            total = len(futures)
2216            for fut in tqdm(futures, total=total, desc=progress_desc):
2217                result = fut.result()
2218                processed += 1
2219                if processed % 10 == 0 or processed == total:
2220                    logger.info(f"Distributed progress: {processed}/{total}")
2221                page = pages[processed - 1]
2222                if page in self.pending_pages:
2223                    self.pending_pages.remove(page)
2224                if result:
2225                    self.dataset.append(result)
2226                self._update_progress()
2227            if pipeline_name:
2228                pipe = get_pipeline(pipeline_name)
2229                self.dataset = pipe(self.dataset)
2230            return self.dataset
2231
2232        if not use_queue:
2233            cpu_futures = []
2234            with ThreadPoolExecutor(
2235                max_workers=Config.MAX_THREADS
2236            ) as th_executor, ProcessPoolExecutor(
2237                max_workers=Config.MAX_PROCESSES
2238            ) as pr_executor:
2239                page_futures = {
2240                    th_executor.submit(self.process_page, page, pr_executor): page
2241                    for page in pages
2242                }
2243
2244                processed = 0
2245                total = len(page_futures)
2246                for future in tqdm(
2247                    as_completed(page_futures), total=total, desc=progress_desc
2248                ):
2249                    cpu_future = future.result()
2250                    page = page_futures[future]
2251                    processed += 1
2252                    if page in self.pending_pages:
2253                        self.pending_pages.remove(page)
2254                    if processed % 10 == 0 or processed == total:
2255                        logger.info(f"Thread progress: {processed}/{total}")
2256                    if cpu_future:
2257                        cpu_futures.append(cpu_future)
2258                    self._update_progress()
2259
2260                processed_cpu = 0
2261                total_cpu = len(cpu_futures)
2262                for future in tqdm(
2263                    as_completed(cpu_futures),
2264                    total=total_cpu,
2265                    desc="Processando conteúdo",
2266                ):
2267                    result = future.result()
2268                    processed_cpu += 1
2269                    if processed_cpu % 10 == 0 or processed_cpu == total_cpu:
2270                        logger.info(f"Process progress: {processed_cpu}/{total_cpu}")
2271                    if result:
2272                        self.dataset.append(result)
2273                    self._update_progress()
2275            if pipeline_name:
2276                pipe = get_pipeline(pipeline_name)
2277                self.dataset = pipe(self.dataset)
2278            return self.dataset
2279
2280        # Queue based processing
2281        from task_queue import publish, consume
2283        for page in pages:
2284            publish("scrape_tasks", page)
2285
2286        processed = 0
2287        total = len(pages)
2288        for result in consume("scrape_results"):
2289            if result is None:
2290                continue
2291            processed += 1
2292            for p in list(self.pending_pages):
2293                if p.get("title") == result.get("title") and p.get(
2294                    "lang", p.get("language")
2295                ) == result.get("language"):
2296                    self.pending_pages.remove(p)
2297                    break
2298            self.dataset.append(result)
2299            self._update_progress()
2300            if processed % 10 == 0 or processed == total:
2301                logger.info(f"Queue progress: {processed}/{total}")
2302            if processed == total:
2303                break
2305        if pipeline_name:
2306            pipe = get_pipeline(pipeline_name)
2307            self.dataset = pipe(self.dataset)
2308        return self.dataset
2309
2310    async def build_from_pages_async(
2311        self,
2312        pages: List[dict],
2313        progress_desc: str = "Processando páginas",
2314        pipeline_name: str | None = None,
2315    ) -> List[dict]:
2316        """Asynchronous version of :meth:`build_from_pages`."""
2317        if self.pending_pages:
2318            pages = self.pending_pages
2319        else:
2320            self.pending_pages = pages.copy()
2321
2322        cpu_futures = []
2323        with ProcessPoolExecutor(max_workers=Config.MAX_PROCESSES) as pr_executor:
2324            tasks = [self.process_page_async(page, pr_executor) for page in pages]
2326            processed = 0
2327            total = len(tasks)
2328            for coro in tqdm(
2329                asyncio.as_completed(tasks), total=total, desc=progress_desc
2330            ):
2331                cpu_future = await coro
2332                processed += 1
2333                if self.pending_pages:
2334                    self.pending_pages.pop(0)
2335                if processed % 10 == 0 or processed == total:
2336                    logger.info(f"Async progress: {processed}/{total}")
2337                if cpu_future:
2338                    cpu_futures.append(cpu_future)
2339                self._update_progress()
2340
2341            processed_cpu = 0
2342            total_cpu = len(cpu_futures)
2343            for future in tqdm(
2344                as_completed(cpu_futures), total=total_cpu, desc="Processando conteúdo"
2345            ):
2346                result = future.result()
2347                processed_cpu += 1
2348                if processed_cpu % 10 == 0 or processed_cpu == total_cpu:
2349                    logger.info(f"Process progress: {processed_cpu}/{total_cpu}")
2350                if result:
2351                    self.dataset.append(result)
2352                self._update_progress()
2353
2354        if pipeline_name:
2355            pipe = get_pipeline(pipeline_name)
2356            self.dataset = pipe(self.dataset)
2357        return self.dataset
2358
2359    def enhance_with_clustering(self):
2360        if not self.dataset:
2361            return
2362
2363        # Clusteriza baseado nos embeddings de conteúdo
2364        texts = [item["content"] for item in self.dataset]
2365        clusters = cluster_texts(texts)
2366
2367        # Adiciona clusters ao dataset
2368        for i, item in enumerate(self.dataset):
2369            item["cluster"] = int(clusters[i])
2370
2371        # Opcionalmente filtra registros pelo nível de complexidade
2372        self.dataset = filter_by_complexity(
2373            self.dataset, self.min_complexity, self.max_complexity
2374        )
2375
2376    def save_dataset(self, format: str = "all", output_dir: str = Config.OUTPUT_DIR):
2377        os.makedirs(output_dir, exist_ok=True)
2378
2379        if not self.dataset:
2380            logger.warning("Nenhum dado para salvar")
2381            return
2382
2383        # Balance records by quality before further processing
2384        try:
2385            self.dataset = balance_quality(self.dataset)
2386        except Exception:
2387            pass
2388
2389        for rec in self.dataset:
2390            if "content" in rec:
2391                rec["content"] = dq.strip_credentials(rec["content"])
2392
2393        # Remove near-duplicates based on Simhash
2394        try:
2395            self.dataset, rem_sim = dq.deduplicate_by_simhash(self.dataset)
2396            self.duplicates_removed += rem_sim
2397        except Exception as e:  # pragma: no cover - library issues
2398            logger.error(f"Erro na deduplicação Simhash: {e}")
2399
2400        try:
2401            plag = dq.detect_code_plagiarism(self.dataset)
2402            if plag:
2403                logger.warning(f"Registros plagiados removidos: {len(plag)}")
2404                self.dataset = [r for r in self.dataset if r not in plag]
2405                self.invalid_records += len(plag)
2406        except Exception as e:  # pragma: no cover - library issues
2407            logger.error(f"Erro na verificação de plágio: {e}")
2408
2409        # Validação dos registros antes de salvar
2410        validated_data = []
2411        for item in self.dataset:
2412            valid = True
2413
2414            # Checa se embeddings contêm apenas números finitos
2415            if not np.all(np.isfinite(item.get("content_embedding", []))):
2416                logger.warning(
2417                    f"content_embedding inválido para {item.get('id', 'desconhecido')}"
2418                )
2419                valid = False
2420
2421            if not np.all(np.isfinite(item.get("summary_embedding", []))):
2422                logger.warning(
2423                    f"summary_embedding inválido para {item.get('id', 'desconhecido')}"
2424                )
2425                valid = False
2426
2427            # Checa presença de perguntas e respostas
2428            if not item.get("questions"):
2429                logger.warning(
2430                    f"Registro {item.get('id', 'desconhecido')} sem perguntas"
2431                )
2432                valid = False
2433
2434            if not item.get("answers"):
2435                logger.warning(
2436                    f"Registro {item.get('id', 'desconhecido')} sem respostas"
2437                )
2438                valid = False
2439
2440            if "relations" not in item:
2441                logger.warning(
2442                    f"Registro {item.get('id', 'desconhecido')} sem relações"
2443                )
2444                valid = False
2445
2446            # Verifica tamanho do resumo
2447            summary_text = item.get("summary", "")
2448            if len(summary_text) < Config.MIN_TEXT_LENGTH:
2449                logger.warning(
2450                    f"Resumo muito curto para {item.get('id', 'desconhecido')}"
2451                )
2452                valid = False
2453
2454            if valid:
2455                validated_data.append(item)
2456
2457        # Quality metrics
2458        try:
2459            metrics.dataset_completeness.set(
2460                len(validated_data) / len(self.dataset) if self.dataset else 0.0
2461            )
2462            topics = {i.get("topic") for i in validated_data if i.get("topic")}
2463            metrics.dataset_topic_diversity.set(
2464                len(topics) / len(validated_data) if validated_data else 0.0
2465            )
2466            langs = {i.get("language") for i in validated_data if i.get("language")}
2467            cats = {i.get("category") for i in validated_data if i.get("category")}
2468            metrics.dataset_language_coverage.set(
2469                len(langs) / len(Config.LANGUAGES) if Config.LANGUAGES else 0.0
2470            )
2471            metrics.dataset_domain_coverage.set(
2472                len(cats) / len(Config.CATEGORIES) if Config.CATEGORIES else 0.0
2473            )
2474            bias = 1.0 if len(langs) < len(Config.LANGUAGES) / 2 else 0.0
2475            metrics.dataset_bias_detected.set(bias)
2476        except Exception:  # pragma: no cover - metrics failures
2477            pass
2478
2479        if not validated_data:
2480            logger.warning("Nenhum registro válido para salvar")
2481            return
2482
2483        # Ordena por idioma e tópico
2484        sorted_data = sorted(validated_data, key=lambda x: (x["language"], x["topic"]))
2485
2486        backend = storage.get_backend(Config.STORAGE_BACKEND, output_dir)
2487
2488        def _bump(ver: str) -> str:
2489            try:
2490                major, minor, patch = [int(x) for x in ver.split(".")]
2491            except Exception:
2492                return "1.0.0"
2493            patch += 1
2494            return f"{major}.{minor}.{patch}"
2495
2496        info_path = os.path.join(output_dir, "dataset_info.json")
2497        old_info = {}
2498        if os.path.exists(info_path):
2499            try:
2500                with open(info_path, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
2501                    old_info = json.load(f)
2502            except Exception:
2503                old_info = {}
2504        old_version = old_info.get("version", "0.0.0")
2505        old_size = old_info.get("size", 0)
2506        new_version = _bump(old_version)
2507
2508        backend.save_dataset(sorted_data, format, version=new_version)
2509        logger.info(f"Dataset salvo usando backend {Config.STORAGE_BACKEND}")
2510
2511        if format == "qa":
2512            save_qa_dataset(sorted_data, Path(output_dir) / "qa_pairs.json")
2513        if format == "text":
2514            save_text_corpus(sorted_data, Path(output_dir) / "text_corpus")
2515
2516        if format in ["all", "hf", "tfrecord"]:
2517            try:
2518                hf_dataset = Dataset.from_list(sorted_data)
2519                hf_dataset.save_to_disk(os.path.join(output_dir, "huggingface"))
2520                logger.info(
2521                    f"Dataset salvo para HuggingFace: {os.path.join(output_dir, 'huggingface')}"
2522                )
2523            except Exception as e:
2524                logger.error(f"Erro ao salvar dataset HuggingFace: {e}")
2525
2526        # Write metadata about the dataset
2527        try:
2528            sources = {
2529                item.get("metadata", {}).get("source", "unknown")
2530                for item in sorted_data
2531            }
2532            info = {
2533                "source": list(sources)[0] if len(sources) == 1 else sorted(sources),
2534                "collection_date": datetime.utcnow().date().isoformat(),
2535                "license": "CC BY-SA 4.0",
2536                "version": new_version,
2537                "size": len(sorted_data),
2538            }
2539            with open(
2540                os.path.join(output_dir, "dataset_info.json"), "w", encoding="utf-8"
2541            ) as f:
2542                json.dump(info, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
2543
2544            diff_ratio = (
2545                abs(len(sorted_data) - old_size) / max(old_size, 1) if old_info else 1.0
2546            )
2547            if diff_ratio > 0.1:
2548                with open(
2549                    os.path.join(output_dir, "CHANGELOG.txt"), "a", encoding="utf-8"
2550                ) as cf:
2551                    cf.write(
2552                        f"{datetime.utcnow().isoformat()} - v{new_version} size changed {old_size}->{len(sorted_data)}\n"
2553                    )
2554        except Exception as e:  # pragma: no cover - unexpected I/O errors
2555            logger.error(f"Erro ao salvar dataset_info.json: {e}")
            
    1593    def __init__(

1595        include_revisions: bool = False,

1597        min_complexity: int | None = None,

1601        self.embedding_model = NLPProcessor.get_embedding_model()

1605        self.duplicates_removed = 0

1608        self.rev_limit = rev_limit
1609        self.min_complexity = min_complexity
1610        self.max_complexity = max_complexity
1611

1618                    self.dataset = json.load(f)
1619            except Exception as e:  # pragma: no cover - corrupted file
1620                logger.error(f"Erro ao carregar {data_path}: {e}")
1621            else:
1622                try:
1623                    os.remove(data_path)
1624                except OSError:
1625                    pass
1626        if os.path.exists(pages_path):
1627            try:
1628                with open(pages_path, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
1629                    self.pending_pages = json.load(f)
1630            except Exception as e:  # pragma: no cover - corrupted file
1631                logger.error(f"Erro ao carregar {pages_path}: {e}")
1632            else:
1633                try:
1634                    os.remove(pages_path)
1635                except OSError:
1636                    pass
1637        if self.dataset or self.pending_pages:
1638            self._update_progress()
            
    1685    def process_page(
1686        self, page_info: dict, proc_executor: Optional[ProcessPoolExecutor] = None
1687    ) -> Optional[object]:
1688        start_time = time.perf_counter()
1689        try:
1690            wiki = WikipediaAdvanced(page_info["lang"])
1691            page = wiki.fetch_page(page_info["title"])
1692
1693            if not page or not page.exists():
1694                return None
1695
1696            # Extrai e limpa o texto
1697            raw_text = clean_text(page.text)
1698            clean_content = advanced_clean_text(
1699                raw_text,
1700                page_info["lang"],
1701                remove_stopwords=Config.REMOVE_STOPWORDS,
1702            )
1703
1704            if len(clean_content) < Config.MIN_TEXT_LENGTH:
1705                return None
1706
1707            if proc_executor:
1708                images = extract_images(getattr(page, "_html", ""))
1709                revisions = None
1710                if self.include_revisions:
1711                    revisions = wiki.get_revision_history(
1712                        page_info["title"], self.rev_limit
1713                    )
1714                return proc_executor.submit(
1715                    cpu_process_page,
1716                    page_info["title"],
1717                    clean_content,
1718                    page_info["lang"],
1719                    page_info.get("category", ""),
1720                    images,
1721                    revisions,
1722                    self.rev_limit,
1723                )
1724
1725            # Sumariza o conteúdo
1726            summary = summarize_text(clean_content, page_info["lang"])
1727
1728            # Gera QA pairs avançadas
1729            qa_data = self.generate_qa_pairs(
1730                title=page_info["title"],
1731                content=clean_content,
1732                summary=summary,
1733                lang=page_info["lang"],
1734                category=page_info.get("category", ""),
1735            )
1736            qa_data["entities"] = extract_entities(clean_content)
1737            images = extract_images(getattr(page, "_html", ""))
1738            qa_data["images"] = images
1739            if self.include_revisions:
1740                qa_data.setdefault("metadata", {})["revisions"] = (
1741                    wiki.get_revision_history(page_info["title"], self.rev_limit)
1742                )
1743            metrics.scrape_success.inc()
1744            metrics.pages_scraped_total.inc()
1745            return qa_data
1746        except Exception as e:
1747            metrics.scrape_error.inc()
1748            logger.error(f"Erro ao processar página {page_info.get('title', '')}: {e}")
1749            return None
1750        finally:
1751            metrics.page_processing_seconds.observe(time.perf_counter() - start_time)
            
    1753    async def process_page_async(
1754        self, page_info: dict, proc_executor: Optional[ProcessPoolExecutor] = None
1755    ) -> Optional[object]:
1756        """Asynchronous wrapper for :meth:`process_page`."""
1757        return await asyncio.to_thread(self.process_page, page_info, proc_executor)
            
    1759    def generate_qa_pairs(
1760        self,
1761        title: str,
1762        content: str,
1763        summary: str,
1764        lang: str,
1765        category: str,
1766        extra_metadata: dict | None = None,
1767    ) -> dict:
1768        raw_code = content
1769        code_lang = detect_programming_language(content)
1770        complexities = {}
1771        docstring = ""
1772        signature = ""
1773        problems: list[str] = []
1774        fixed_version = content
1775        parse_ok = True
1776        context_from_code = ""
1777        if code_lang != "unknown":
1778            parse_ok = parse_with_language(content, code_lang)
1779            context_from_code = extract_context_from_code(content, code_lang)
1780            if not parse_ok:
1781                return {}
1782            signature = parse_function_signature(content)
1783            try:
1784                tree = ast.parse(content)
1785                func = next(
1786                    (
1787                        n
1788                        for n in tree.body
1789                        if isinstance(n, (ast.FunctionDef, ast.AsyncFunctionDef))
1790                    ),
1791                    None,
1792                )
1793                if func:
1794                    ds = ast.get_docstring(func)
1795                    if ds:
1796                        docstring = docstring_to_google(ds)
1797            except Exception:
1798                pass
1799            content = normalize_indentation(remove_comments(content, code_lang))
1800            complexities = get_functions_complexity(content, code_lang)
1801            problems, fixed_version = scan_code(content)
1802            if self.min_complexity is not None and complexities:
1803                if max(complexities.values()) < self.min_complexity:
1804                    return {}
1805            if self.max_complexity is not None and complexities:
1806                if max(complexities.values()) > self.max_complexity:
1807                    return {}
1808        else:
1809            problems, fixed_version = scan_code(content)
1810
1811        # Extrai keywords para gerar perguntas variadas
1812        keywords = extract_keywords(content, lang)
1813
1814        tags = self._extract_tags(keywords, extra_metadata)
1815
1816        # Gera múltiplas perguntas baseadas no conteúdo
1817        questions = self._generate_questions(title, content, lang, keywords)
1818
1819        # Gera respostas completas
1820        answers = self._generate_answers(content, summary, lang)
1821
1822        # Relações semânticas básicas
1823        relations = extract_relations(content, lang)
1824        relations_regex = extract_relations_regex(content)
1825        relations.extend(r for r in relations_regex if r not in relations)
1826
1827        # Cria embeddings para busca semântica
1828        content_embedding = self.embedding_model.encode(
1829            content, show_progress_bar=False
1830        )
1831        summary_embedding = self.embedding_model.encode(
1832            summary, show_progress_bar=False
1833        )
1834
1835        # Classificação avançada de tópicos
1836        topic, subtopic = self._classify_topic(title, content, lang)
1837
1838        rec_id = hashlib.md5(f"{title}_{lang}".encode("utf-8")).hexdigest()
1839        diagram_path = ""
1840        if code_lang != "unknown":
1841            try:
1842                diagram_path = generate_diagram(
1843                    content, os.path.join(Config.LOG_DIR, "diagrams"), rec_id
1844                )
1845            except Exception:
1846                diagram_path = ""
1847        explanations = generate_explanations(content, lang)
1848        theory_links = link_theory(content)
1849
1850        record = {
1851            "id": rec_id,
1852            "title": title,
1853            "language": lang,
1854            "category": category,
1855            "topic": topic,
1856            "subtopic": subtopic,
1857            "keywords": keywords,
1858            "tags": tags,
1859            "content": content,
1860            "raw_code": raw_code if code_lang != "unknown" else "",
1861            "summary": summary,
1862            "context": context_from_code or summary,
1863            "problems": problems,
1864            "fixed_version": fixed_version,
1865            "lessons": extra_metadata.get("lessons", "") if extra_metadata else "",
1866            "origin_metrics": (
1867                extra_metadata.get("origin_metrics", {}) if extra_metadata else {}
1868            ),
1869            "challenge": (extra_metadata.get("challenge") if extra_metadata else None)
1870            or generate_challenge_prompt(problems),
1871            "content_embedding": content_embedding.tolist(),
1872            "summary_embedding": summary_embedding.tolist(),
1873            "quality_score": (
1874                extra_metadata.get("quality_score", 0.0) if extra_metadata else 0.0
1875            ),
1876            "quality": None,
1877            "reason": "",
1878            "quality_level": None,
1879            "quality_reason": "",
1880            "questions": questions,
1881            "answers": answers,
1882            "relations": relations,
1883            "tests": extra_metadata.get("tests", []) if extra_metadata else [],
1884            "docstring": docstring,
1885            "diagram_path": diagram_path,
1886            "theory_links": theory_links,
1887            "explanations": explanations,
1888            "created_at": datetime.utcnow().isoformat(),
1889            "metadata": {
1890                "length": len(content),
1891                "source": "wikipedia",
1892                "source_url": f"{get_base_url(lang)}/wiki/{title.replace(' ', '_')}",
1893            },
1894        }
1895
1896        try:
1897            from provenance.tracker import record_provenance
1898
1899            prov = record_provenance(record["metadata"]["source_url"], content)
1900            record["metadata"].update(prov)
1901        except Exception:
1902            pass
1903
1904        # Determine quality classification when possible
1905        if extra_metadata:
1906            if any(
1907                k in extra_metadata for k in ["stars", "stargazers_count", "repository"]
1908            ):
1909                q, r = classify_github_repo(extra_metadata)
1910                record["quality"], record["reason"] = q, r
1911                record["quality_level"], record["quality_reason"] = q, r
1912            elif "score" in extra_metadata:
1913                q, r = classify_stackoverflow_answer(extra_metadata)
1914                record["quality"], record["reason"] = q, r
1915                record["quality_level"], record["quality_reason"] = q, r
1916        if record["quality"] is None:
1917            score = record.get("quality_score", 0.0)
1918            if score >= 5:
1919                q = "high"
1920            elif score >= 2:
1921                q = "medium"
1922            else:
1923                q = "low"
1924            record["quality"] = q
1925            record["quality_level"] = q
1926            record["reason"] = "quality score"
1927            record["quality_reason"] = "quality score"
1928        if code_lang != "unknown":
1929            record["metadata"]["code_language"] = code_lang
1930            if complexities:
1931                record["metadata"]["complexities"] = complexities
1932            if docstring:
1933                record["docstring"] = docstring
1934            if signature:
1935                record["signature"] = signature
1936        if extra_metadata:
1937            if "wikidata_id" in extra_metadata:
1938                record["wikidata_id"] = extra_metadata["wikidata_id"]
1939            if "image_url" in extra_metadata:
1940                record["image_url"] = extra_metadata["image_url"]
1941            if "discussion_links" in extra_metadata:
1942                record["discussion_links"] = extra_metadata["discussion_links"]
1943
1944        if "discussion_links" not in record:
1945            try:
1946                links = search_discussions(record["id"])
1947            except Exception:
1948                links = []
1949            record["discussion_links"] = links
1950        try:
1951            storage_sqlite.save_to_db(
1952                {"id": record["id"], "metadata": record.get("metadata", {})}
1953            )
1954        except Exception as e:
1955            logger.error(f"Erro ao salvar no SQLite: {e}")
1956        return record
        build_from_pages(	self,	pages: List[dict],	progress_desc: str = 'Processando páginas',	use_queue: bool = False,	client=None,	pipeline_name: str | None = None) -> List[dict]:
            
    2198    def build_from_pages(
2199        self,
2200        pages: List[dict],
2201        progress_desc: str = "Processando páginas",
2202        use_queue: bool = False,
2203        client=None,
2204        pipeline_name: str | None = None,
2205    ) -> List[dict]:
2206        """Process pages locally or enfileira tarefas para processamento."""
2207        if self.pending_pages:
2208            pages = self.pending_pages
2209        else:
2210            self.pending_pages = pages.copy()
2211
2212        if client:
2213            futures = [client.submit(self.process_page, page) for page in pages]
2214            processed = 0
2215            total = len(futures)
2216            for fut in tqdm(futures, total=total, desc=progress_desc):
2217                result = fut.result()
2218                processed += 1
2219                if processed % 10 == 0 or processed == total:
2220                    logger.info(f"Distributed progress: {processed}/{total}")
2221                page = pages[processed - 1]
2222                if page in self.pending_pages:
2223                    self.pending_pages.remove(page)
2224                if result:
2225                    self.dataset.append(result)
2226                self._update_progress()
2227            if pipeline_name:
2228                pipe = get_pipeline(pipeline_name)
2229                self.dataset = pipe(self.dataset)
2230            return self.dataset
2231
2232        if not use_queue:
2233            cpu_futures = []
2234            with ThreadPoolExecutor(
2235                max_workers=Config.MAX_THREADS
2236            ) as th_executor, ProcessPoolExecutor(
2237                max_workers=Config.MAX_PROCESSES
2238            ) as pr_executor:
2239                page_futures = {
2240                    th_executor.submit(self.process_page, page, pr_executor): page
2241                    for page in pages
2242                }
2243
2244                processed = 0
2245                total = len(page_futures)
2246                for future in tqdm(
2247                    as_completed(page_futures), total=total, desc=progress_desc
2248                ):
2249                    cpu_future = future.result()
2250                    page = page_futures[future]
2251                    processed += 1
2252                    if page in self.pending_pages:
2253                        self.pending_pages.remove(page)
2254                    if processed % 10 == 0 or processed == total:
2255                        logger.info(f"Thread progress: {processed}/{total}")
2256                    if cpu_future:
2257                        cpu_futures.append(cpu_future)
2258                    self._update_progress()
2259
2260                processed_cpu = 0
2261                total_cpu = len(cpu_futures)
2262                for future in tqdm(
2263                    as_completed(cpu_futures),
2264                    total=total_cpu,
2265                    desc="Processando conteúdo",
2266                ):
2267                    result = future.result()
2268                    processed_cpu += 1
2269                    if processed_cpu % 10 == 0 or processed_cpu == total_cpu:
2270                        logger.info(f"Process progress: {processed_cpu}/{total_cpu}")
2271                    if result:
2272                        self.dataset.append(result)
2273                    self._update_progress()
2274
2275            if pipeline_name:
2276                pipe = get_pipeline(pipeline_name)
2277                self.dataset = pipe(self.dataset)
2278            return self.dataset
2279
2280        # Queue based processing
2281        from task_queue import publish, consume
2282
2283        for page in pages:
2284            publish("scrape_tasks", page)
2285
2286        processed = 0
2287        total = len(pages)
2288        for result in consume("scrape_results"):
2289            if result is None:
2290                continue
2291            processed += 1
2292            for p in list(self.pending_pages):
2293                if p.get("title") == result.get("title") and p.get(
2294                    "lang", p.get("language")
2295                ) == result.get("language"):
2296                    self.pending_pages.remove(p)
2297                    break
2298            self.dataset.append(result)
2299            self._update_progress()
2300            if processed % 10 == 0 or processed == total:
2301                logger.info(f"Queue progress: {processed}/{total}")
2302            if processed == total:
2303                break
2304
2305        if pipeline_name:
2306            pipe = get_pipeline(pipeline_name)
2307            self.dataset = pipe(self.dataset)
2308        return self.dataset
        build_from_pages_async(	self,	pages: List[dict],	progress_desc: str = 'Processando páginas',	pipeline_name: str | None = None) -> List[dict]:
            
    2310    async def build_from_pages_async(
2311        self,
2312        pages: List[dict],
2313        progress_desc: str = "Processando páginas",
2314        pipeline_name: str | None = None,
2315    ) -> List[dict]:
2316        """Asynchronous version of :meth:`build_from_pages`."""
2317        if self.pending_pages:
2318            pages = self.pending_pages
2319        else:
2320            self.pending_pages = pages.copy()
2321
2322        cpu_futures = []
2323        with ProcessPoolExecutor(max_workers=Config.MAX_PROCESSES) as pr_executor:
2324            tasks = [self.process_page_async(page, pr_executor) for page in pages]
2325
2326            processed = 0
2327            total = len(tasks)
2328            for coro in tqdm(
2329                asyncio.as_completed(tasks), total=total, desc=progress_desc
2330            ):
2331                cpu_future = await coro
2332                processed += 1
2333                if self.pending_pages:
2334                    self.pending_pages.pop(0)
2335                if processed % 10 == 0 or processed == total:
2336                    logger.info(f"Async progress: {processed}/{total}")
2337                if cpu_future:
2338                    cpu_futures.append(cpu_future)
2339                self._update_progress()
2340
2341            processed_cpu = 0
2342            total_cpu = len(cpu_futures)
2343            for future in tqdm(
2344                as_completed(cpu_futures), total=total_cpu, desc="Processando conteúdo"
2345            ):
2346                result = future.result()
2347                processed_cpu += 1
2348                if processed_cpu % 10 == 0 or processed_cpu == total_cpu:
2349                    logger.info(f"Process progress: {processed_cpu}/{total_cpu}")
2350                if result:
2351                    self.dataset.append(result)
2352                self._update_progress()
2353
2354        if pipeline_name:
2355            pipe = get_pipeline(pipeline_name)
2356            self.dataset = pipe(self.dataset)
2357        return self.dataset
            
    2359    def enhance_with_clustering(self):
2360        if not self.dataset:
2361            return
2362
2363        # Clusteriza baseado nos embeddings de conteúdo
2364        texts = [item["content"] for item in self.dataset]
2365        clusters = cluster_texts(texts)
2366
2367        # Adiciona clusters ao dataset
2368        for i, item in enumerate(self.dataset):
2369            item["cluster"] = int(clusters[i])
2370
2371        # Opcionalmente filtra registros pelo nível de complexidade
2372        self.dataset = filter_by_complexity(
2373            self.dataset, self.min_complexity, self.max_complexity
2374        )
            
    2376    def save_dataset(self, format: str = "all", output_dir: str = Config.OUTPUT_DIR):
2377        os.makedirs(output_dir, exist_ok=True)
2378
2379        if not self.dataset:
2380            logger.warning("Nenhum dado para salvar")
2381            return
2382
2383        # Balance records by quality before further processing
2384        try:
2385            self.dataset = balance_quality(self.dataset)
2386        except Exception:
2387            pass
2388
2389        for rec in self.dataset:
2390            if "content" in rec:
2391                rec["content"] = dq.strip_credentials(rec["content"])
2392
2393        # Remove near-duplicates based on Simhash
2394        try:
2395            self.dataset, rem_sim = dq.deduplicate_by_simhash(self.dataset)
2396            self.duplicates_removed += rem_sim
2397        except Exception as e:  # pragma: no cover - library issues
2398            logger.error(f"Erro na deduplicação Simhash: {e}")
2399
2400        try:
2401            plag = dq.detect_code_plagiarism(self.dataset)
2402            if plag:
2403                logger.warning(f"Registros plagiados removidos: {len(plag)}")
2404                self.dataset = [r for r in self.dataset if r not in plag]
2405                self.invalid_records += len(plag)
2406        except Exception as e:  # pragma: no cover - library issues
2407            logger.error(f"Erro na verificação de plágio: {e}")
2408
2409        # Validação dos registros antes de salvar
2410        validated_data = []
2411        for item in self.dataset:
2412            valid = True
2413
2414            # Checa se embeddings contêm apenas números finitos
2415            if not np.all(np.isfinite(item.get("content_embedding", []))):
2416                logger.warning(
2417                    f"content_embedding inválido para {item.get('id', 'desconhecido')}"
2418                )
2419                valid = False
2420
2421            if not np.all(np.isfinite(item.get("summary_embedding", []))):
2422                logger.warning(
2423                    f"summary_embedding inválido para {item.get('id', 'desconhecido')}"
2424                )
2425                valid = False
2426
2427            # Checa presença de perguntas e respostas
2428            if not item.get("questions"):
2429                logger.warning(
2430                    f"Registro {item.get('id', 'desconhecido')} sem perguntas"
2431                )
2432                valid = False
2433
2434            if not item.get("answers"):
2435                logger.warning(
2436                    f"Registro {item.get('id', 'desconhecido')} sem respostas"
2437                )
2438                valid = False
2439
2440            if "relations" not in item:
2441                logger.warning(
2442                    f"Registro {item.get('id', 'desconhecido')} sem relações"
2443                )
2444                valid = False
2445
2446            # Verifica tamanho do resumo
2447            summary_text = item.get("summary", "")
2448            if len(summary_text) < Config.MIN_TEXT_LENGTH:
2449                logger.warning(
2450                    f"Resumo muito curto para {item.get('id', 'desconhecido')}"
2451                )
2452                valid = False
2453
2454            if valid:
2455                validated_data.append(item)
2456
2457        # Quality metrics
2458        try:
2459            metrics.dataset_completeness.set(
2460                len(validated_data) / len(self.dataset) if self.dataset else 0.0
2461            )
2462            topics = {i.get("topic") for i in validated_data if i.get("topic")}
2463            metrics.dataset_topic_diversity.set(
2464                len(topics) / len(validated_data) if validated_data else 0.0
2465            )
2466            langs = {i.get("language") for i in validated_data if i.get("language")}
2467            cats = {i.get("category") for i in validated_data if i.get("category")}
2468            metrics.dataset_language_coverage.set(
2469                len(langs) / len(Config.LANGUAGES) if Config.LANGUAGES else 0.0
2470            )
2471            metrics.dataset_domain_coverage.set(
2472                len(cats) / len(Config.CATEGORIES) if Config.CATEGORIES else 0.0
2473            )
2474            bias = 1.0 if len(langs) < len(Config.LANGUAGES) / 2 else 0.0
2475            metrics.dataset_bias_detected.set(bias)
2476        except Exception:  # pragma: no cover - metrics failures
2477            pass
2478
2479        if not validated_data:
2480            logger.warning("Nenhum registro válido para salvar")
2481            return
2482
2483        # Ordena por idioma e tópico
2484        sorted_data = sorted(validated_data, key=lambda x: (x["language"], x["topic"]))
2485
2486        backend = storage.get_backend(Config.STORAGE_BACKEND, output_dir)
2487
2488        def _bump(ver: str) -> str:
2489            try:
2490                major, minor, patch = [int(x) for x in ver.split(".")]
2491            except Exception:
2492                return "1.0.0"
2493            patch += 1
2494            return f"{major}.{minor}.{patch}"
2495
2496        info_path = os.path.join(output_dir, "dataset_info.json")
2497        old_info = {}
2498        if os.path.exists(info_path):
2499            try:
2500                with open(info_path, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
2501                    old_info = json.load(f)
2502            except Exception:
2503                old_info = {}
2504        old_version = old_info.get("version", "0.0.0")
2505        old_size = old_info.get("size", 0)
2506        new_version = _bump(old_version)
2507
2508        backend.save_dataset(sorted_data, format, version=new_version)
2509        logger.info(f"Dataset salvo usando backend {Config.STORAGE_BACKEND}")
2510
2511        if format == "qa":
2512            save_qa_dataset(sorted_data, Path(output_dir) / "qa_pairs.json")
2513        if format == "text":
2514            save_text_corpus(sorted_data, Path(output_dir) / "text_corpus")
2515
2516        if format in ["all", "hf", "tfrecord"]:
2517            try:
2518                hf_dataset = Dataset.from_list(sorted_data)
2519                hf_dataset.save_to_disk(os.path.join(output_dir, "huggingface"))
2520                logger.info(
2521                    f"Dataset salvo para HuggingFace: {os.path.join(output_dir, 'huggingface')}"
2522                )
2523            except Exception as e:
2524                logger.error(f"Erro ao salvar dataset HuggingFace: {e}")
2525
2526        # Write metadata about the dataset
2527        try:
2528            sources = {
2529                item.get("metadata", {}).get("source", "unknown")
2530                for item in sorted_data
2531            }
2532            info = {
2533                "source": list(sources)[0] if len(sources) == 1 else sorted(sources),
2534                "collection_date": datetime.utcnow().date().isoformat(),
2535                "license": "CC BY-SA 4.0",
2536                "version": new_version,
2537                "size": len(sorted_data),
2538            }
2539            with open(
2540                os.path.join(output_dir, "dataset_info.json"), "w", encoding="utf-8"
2541            ) as f:
2542                json.dump(info, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
2543
2544            diff_ratio = (
2545                abs(len(sorted_data) - old_size) / max(old_size, 1) if old_info else 1.0
2546            )
2547            if diff_ratio > 0.1:
2548                with open(
2549                    os.path.join(output_dir, "CHANGELOG.txt"), "a", encoding="utf-8"
2550                ) as cf:
2551                    cf.write(
2552                        f"{datetime.utcnow().isoformat()} - v{new_version} size changed {old_size}->{len(sorted_data)}\n"
2553                    )
2554        except Exception as e:  # pragma: no cover - unexpected I/O errors
2555            logger.error(f"Erro ao salvar dataset_info.json: {e}")
            
    2561def main(
2562    langs: Optional[List[str]] = None,
2563    categories: Optional[List[str]] = None,
2564    fmt: str = "all",
2565    rate_limit_delay: Optional[float] = None,
2566    *,
2567    start_pages: Optional[List[str]] = None,
2568    depth: int = 1,
2569    revisions: bool = False,
2570    rev_limit: int = 5,
2571    client=None,
2572):
2573    """Gera o dataset utilizando os parâmetros fornecidos."""
2574    start_time = time.perf_counter()
2575    metrics.start_metrics_server(int(os.environ.get("METRICS_PORT", "8001")))
2576    logger.info("🚀 Iniciando Wikipedia Scraper Ultra Pro Max - GodMode++")
2577
2578    if rate_limit_delay is not None:
2579        Config.RATE_LIMIT_DELAY = rate_limit_delay
2580        rate_limiter.base_min = rate_limit_delay
2581        rate_limiter.base_max = rate_limit_delay
2582        rate_limiter.reset()
2583
2584    languages = langs or Config.LANGUAGES
2585    cats = Config.CATEGORIES
2586    if categories:
2587        normalized = [normalize_category(c) or c for c in categories]
2588        cats = {c: Config.CATEGORIES.get(c, 1.0) for c in normalized}
2589
2590    builder = DatasetBuilder(include_revisions=revisions, rev_limit=rev_limit)
2591
2592    all_pages: List[dict] = []
2593    for lang in languages:
2594        logger.info(f"🌐 Processando idioma: {lang.upper()}")
2595        wiki = WikipediaAdvanced(lang)
2596
2597        for category, weight in cats.items():
2598            logger.info(f"🔍 Buscando na categoria: {category} (peso: {weight})")
2599
2600            pages = wiki.get_category_members(category)
2601            logger.info(f"📄 Páginas encontradas em {category}: {len(pages)}")
2602
2603            for page in pages:
2604                page["weight"] = weight
2605
2606            all_pages.extend(pages)
2607            time.sleep(Config.RATE_LIMIT_DELAY * 2)
2608
2609        if start_pages:
2610            for sp in start_pages:
2611                logger.info(
2612                    f"🕸️ Rastreiando links a partir de: {sp} (profundidade: {depth})"
2613                )
2614                pages = wiki.crawl_links(sp, depth)
2615                logger.info(f"📄 Páginas coletadas de {sp}: {len(pages)}")
2616                all_pages.extend(pages)
2617                time.sleep(Config.RATE_LIMIT_DELAY * 2)
2618
2619    logger.info(f"📚 Total de páginas coletadas: {len(all_pages)}")
2620
2621    sig = inspect.signature(builder.build_from_pages)
2622    if "pipeline_name" in sig.parameters:
2623        builder.build_from_pages(
2624            all_pages,
2625            "Construindo dataset",
2626            client=client,
2627            pipeline_name="default",
2628        )
2629    else:
2630        builder.build_from_pages(all_pages, "Construindo dataset", client=client)
2631
2632    logger.info("🧠 Aplicando técnicas avançadas de NLP...")
2633    builder.enhance_with_clustering()
2634
2635    # Carrega dados extras de plugins para completar registros
2636    extra_data: List[dict] = []
2637    try:
2638        from plugins import load_plugin
2639
2640        for plugin_name in [
2641            "stackoverflow",
2642            "wikidata",
2643            "infobox_parser",
2644            "table_parser",
2645        ]:
2646            try:
2647                plugin = load_plugin(plugin_name)
2648            except Exception as e:
2649                logger.error(f"Erro ao carregar plugin {plugin_name}: {e}")
2650                continue
2651            for lang in languages:
2652                for category in cats:
2653                    try:
2654                        items = plugin.fetch_items(lang, category)
2655                        for item in items:
2656                            parsed = plugin.parse_item(item)
2657                            if parsed:
2658                                extra_data.append(parsed)
2659                    except Exception as e:  # pragma: no cover - network errors
2660                        logger.error(f"Erro plugin {plugin_name}: {e}")
2661    except Exception:
2662        pass
2663
2664    # Deduplicação e validação de qualidade
2665    if hasattr(builder, "dataset"):
2666        data, rem_hash = dq.deduplicate_by_hash(getattr(builder, "dataset", []))
2667        data, rem_emb = dq.deduplicate_by_embedding(data)
2668        data = dq.complete_missing_fields(data, extra_data)
2669        data, invalid = dq.validate_semantics(data)
2670
2671        builder.duplicates_removed = rem_hash + rem_emb
2672        builder.invalid_records = invalid
2673        builder.dataset = data
2674        if hasattr(builder, "_update_progress"):
2675            builder._update_progress()
2676
2677    logger.info("💾 Salvando dataset completo...")
2678    builder.save_dataset(format=fmt)
2679
2680    logger.info("✅ Dataset finalizado com sucesso!")
2681    logger.info(f"📊 Estatísticas de cache: {cache.stats()}")
2682    metrics.scrape_session_seconds.observe(time.perf_counter() - start_time)
            
    2685async def main_async(

2712

2714

2718        wiki = WikipediaAdvanced(lang)
2719

2728

2731

2734                logger.info(
2735                    f"🕸️ Rastreiando links a partir de: {sp} (profundidade: {depth})"
2736                )
2737                pages = await wiki.crawl_links_async(sp, depth)
2738                logger.info(f"📄 Páginas coletadas de {sp}: {len(pages)}")
2739                all_pages.extend(pages)
2740                await asyncio.sleep(Config.RATE_LIMIT_DELAY * 2)
2741
2742    logger.info(f"📚 Total de páginas coletadas: {len(all_pages)}")
2743
2744    sig = inspect.signature(builder.build_from_pages_async)
2745    if "pipeline_name" in sig.parameters:
2746        await builder.build_from_pages_async(
2747            all_pages, "Construindo dataset", pipeline_name="default"
2748        )
2749    else:
2750        await builder.build_from_pages_async(all_pages, "Construindo dataset")
2751
2752    logger.info("🧠 Aplicando técnicas avançadas de NLP...")
2753    builder.enhance_with_clustering()
2754
2755    extra_data: List[dict] = []
2756    try:
2757        from plugins import load_plugin
2758
2759        for plugin_name in [
2760            "stackoverflow",
2761            "wikidata",
2762            "infobox_parser",
2763            "table_parser",
2764        ]:
2765            try:
2766                plugin = load_plugin(plugin_name)
2767            except Exception as e:
2768                logger.error(f"Erro ao carregar plugin {plugin_name}: {e}")
2769                continue
2770            for lang in languages:
2771                for category in cats:
2772                    try:
2773                        items = plugin.fetch_items(lang, category)
2774                        for item in items:
2775                            parsed = plugin.parse_item(item)
2776                            if parsed:
2777                                extra_data.append(parsed)
2778                    except Exception as e:  # pragma: no cover - network errors
2779                        logger.error(f"Erro plugin {plugin_name}: {e}")
2780    except Exception:
2781        pass
2782
2783    if hasattr(builder, "dataset"):
2784        data, rem_hash = dq.deduplicate_by_hash(getattr(builder, "dataset", []))
2785        data, rem_emb = dq.deduplicate_by_embedding(data)
2786        data = dq.complete_missing_fields(data, extra_data)
2787        data, invalid = dq.validate_semantics(data)
2788
2789        builder.duplicates_removed = rem_hash + rem_emb
2790        builder.invalid_records = invalid
2791        builder.dataset = data
2792        if hasattr(builder, "_update_progress"):
2793            builder._update_progress()
2794
2795    logger.info("💾 Salvando dataset completo...")
2796    builder.save_dataset(format=fmt)
2797
2798    logger.info("✅ Dataset finalizado com sucesso!")
2799    logger.info(f"📊 Estatísticas de cache: {cache.stats()}")
2800    metrics.scrape_session_seconds.observe(time.perf_counter() - start_time)
